The borrower is a member of the "Kukuli" group loan. The group is based in the district of Cusco, in the Cusco province, department of Cusco.

Emilia Elizabeth is 56 years old and is married with 3 children. Alongside her daily activities she sells paintings from Cusco. She paints the pictures with her husband and they sell them independently to different craft shops. The borrower would like to improve her business and is requesting a loan to buy materials to paint the pictures, such as brushes, paints and frames. 

She would like to thank those that are supporting her dream through this means and is committed to repaying it on time as agreed.

loans.use: The partner requests a loan to buy materials to paint pictures, such as brushes, paint and frames.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemí tiene 33 años, su actividad es una pulpería, esta no es la primera vez que solicita financiamientos, por lo que es una mujer muy emprendedora  Hace más de 4 años que se dedica a este negocio y está ubicada en su casa de habitación en donde asisten muchos clientes que son amigos, familiares, vecinos  y conocidos Ella es muy conocida por ofrecer un buen servicio, el crédito es para la compra de pan, galletas, golosinas, detergentes y granos básicos.
texts.en: Noemi is 33 years old, and has a general store.  This is not the first time she is requesting financing, because she is an enterprising woman.  She has had this business for more than 4 years.  It is located in her home, where she serves many customers, such as friends, family members, neighbors, and acquaintances.  She is known for her good service.  The loan is to buy bread, crackers and cookies, candy, detergents, and basic grains.

loans.use: capital de trabajo

loans.name: Marlene Jeanete

texts.es:
Marlene Jeanet López López
Antonieta es de 23 años de edad, casada, es tejedora en la actividad tiene 8 años de experiencia, solicita su cuarto crédito, para gastos personales y universitarios, en virtud que la misma es utilizada para mejorar su nivel de estudios en la compra de libros. Así mismo los pagos provienen de la actividad a la que se dedica. Por lo que no tendrá dificultades para efectuar los pagos correspondientes.
texts.en: Marlene Jeanet L. L. Antonieta is 23 years old, married, and a weaver in the business. She has 8 years of experience, and is requesting her fourth loan for personal and school expenses.  The business is used to improve her studies by purchasing books.  The payments will come from the work she does, so she will have no problem making the payments as scheduled.

loans.use: gastos universitarios

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KUKULI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Julio; el tiene 32 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; el socio tiene un negocio de restaurant que atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m por medio de este negocio sacan adelante a su hijo, el socio quiere mejorar el restaurant. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar sillas y mesas para el restaurant.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrower is a member of the loan group "Kukuli", located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Julio is 32 years old. He lives with his partner and has a son. He owns a restaurant business that is open from 8am to 4pm. Thanks to the business they are managing to support their son. He would like to improve the resaurant and is requesting a loan to buy chairs and tables for it. 

The borrower would like to thank those supporting his dream through this means, and is committed to repaying the loan on time as agreed.

loans.use: Buy chairs and tables for his restaurant.

loans.name: Maria Estela

texts.es:
María de 44 años, vive en una zona urbana llamada “Suburbio” caracterizada porque la mayoría de habitantes son comerciantes informales.  Tiene una tienda surtida con dulces. 

Comenzó hace 5 años con una tienda pequeña para ayudar con los gastos familiares y así pasar mas tiempo con sus hijos de 19, 15 y 7 años. La mayor cantidad de ventas que tiene en la tienda son con los dulces que vende. Cuando sus hijos llegan de la escuela le ayudan atender la tienda ya que no tiene otra persona. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar bebidas y dulces para tener mas variedad en su negocio. En el futuro quiere aumentar su negocio y tener dinero suficiente para implementar otra tienda y así asegurar la economía de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria is 44 years old and lives in an urban area known as “Suburbio,” where most of the residents are small merchants.  She has a store stocked with sweets.

Five years ago she set up a small store to help with household expenses and to spend more time with her children, 19, 15, and 7 years of age.  The largest sales she has in the store are the sweets she sells.  When her children come home from school, they help her in the store, for she has no one else.

With the loan she wishes to buy beverages and sweets to offer greater variety in her business.  In the future, she would like to grow her business and have enough money to set up another store and thus cover her children’s expenses.

loans.use: Bebidas, dulces

loans.name: El Hadji

texts.fr: Monsieur El hadji W. habite à Yoff. Il est âgé de 37 ans. Il est marié et père d’un enfant qui est âgé d’un an et demi. Monsieur W. est un fervent musulman qui aide les musulmans à pratiquer leur religion. Par conséquent il a choisi son métier de vendeur de chapelet par passion. La satisfaction qu’elle procure à sa clientèle lui donne une grande fierté. Il exerce cette occupation depuis plus de 10 ans. Aussi  il est en même temps gardien dans une école publique depuis plus de 5 ans. Il est sociétaire de la caisse de Yoff depuis février 2010. Il sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs qui sera destiné a l’achat de fils et de perles pour pouvoir répondre aux commandes de ses produits. Avec l’amélioration  de ses gains il souhaite mettre sa famille qui vit au village dans de bonnes conditions.
texts.en:
Mr. El Hadji W. lives in Yoff. He is 37 years old. He is married and the father of an 18-month child. 

Mr. W. is a devoted Muslim who helps Muslim practice their religion. Therefore he chose his rosary retail activity with enthusiasm. He gets great pride providing satisfaction to his customers. He has been practicing this activity for 10 years. He has also been a custodian in a public school for over five years.

He has been a member of the Yoff branch since February 2010. He is requesting a loan of 100 000 francs which he will use to buy string and beads in order to fulfill the order of his products.

With the improvement of his revenue, he wishes to improve the living conditions of his family that lives in the village.

loans.use: Strengthening of his working capital.

loans.name: G.s. Larios Group

texts.es: El señor Carlos tiene 35 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos, los cuales son menores de edad. El señor se dedica a la compra-venta de ropa nueva y usada, los cuales distribuye de manera ambulante y principalmente por encargos. Los problemas que enfrenta muchas veces es que las ventas a veces están buenas, a veces no. Cabe señalarse el señor ya tiene 5 años de dedicarse a este negocio, el cual inicio vendiendo ropa usada, se compraba en ese tiempo surtida, era poco debido a que no tenía mucha clientela, luego se fue ampliando. Otro integrante del grupo es don José Antonio, tiene 32 años de edad es casado y tiene dos hijos que tiene 7 y 5 años respectivamente. Su esposa trabaja en San Marcos como domestica, el ya tiene dos años de tener este negocio por lo que ya posee una clientela bien establecida. Y la última integrante es doña Jeanette, se dedica a la venta de frutas, también vende elotes cocidos y tortillas. Ya tiene más de 5 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, primeramente inicio con recursos propios y fue debido al impulso de su mama que ella estableció este negocio con el objetivo de mantener a su hija. Ella solicita este crédito con el propósito de invertir en su negocio.
texts.en: Carlos is 35 years old. He is married and has two minor children. He buys and sells new and used clothing, which he distributes as a street vendor and mainly via orders. The problem that he faces often is that sometimes the sales are good and sometimes they weren't. It's worth noting that he has been doing this business for five years. He started it selling used clothing. Back then he would buy a variety of clothing. It wasn't much because he didn't have a lot of customers, but it grew.  Another member of the group is José Antonio. He is 32 years old, married and has two children who are 7 and 5. His wife works in San Marcos as a cleaning woman. He has had his business for two years and has an established clientele. The last member is Jeanette. She sells fruit. She also sells cooked sweet corn and tortillas. She has been doing this activity for more than 5 years. She started with her own resources and it was due to an impulse that her mother had that she started this activity in order to support her daughter. She is asking for this loan with the purpose of investing in her business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KUKULI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Maria Luisa; ella tiene 24 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanías como chompas, aretes, collares y bolsos, la socia atiende desde las 10:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería para la tienda. 


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrower is a member of the "Kukuli" loan group, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

Maria Luisa is 24 years old, lives with her partner and has 2 children. Alongside her daily activities she sells crafts such as sweaters, earrings, necklaces and handbags from 10am to 9pm. She would like to expand her business and is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for her shop.

She would like to thank those helping her with her dream through this, and she is committed to repaying the loan in the agreed terms.

loans.use: Buy merchandise for her shop.

loans.name: Annma Rachel

texts.es:
Annma Rachel López  Velásquez
 Annma Rachel es de 46 años de edad, casada, tiene tres hijos varones y  cuatro  mujeres, es  comerciante (venta de ropa típica), en la actividad tiene más de  seis  años de experiencia, solicita su tercer crédito, para compra de mercadería  (cortes típicos), es una inversión rentable lo cual beneficiara a la solicitante para poder pagar el  sin ningún problema.
texts.en:
Annma Rachel López  Velásquez
Annma Rachel is 46 years old, is married and has three sons and four daughters. She is a merchant (sells traditional clothing) and has had more than six years of experience in this field. This will be her third loan to buy merchandize (traditional styles) it is a good investment which will benefit Annma since she will be able to pay without any problems.

loans.use: To buy merchandize

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: La señora Rene tiene 30 años, es conviviente y fruto de ese amor tienen una hija de 5 años llamada Mayli, viven en una casa de madera que logró construir con el sudor de su frente. La señora Rene se dedica al cultivo y producción de cacao y café, lo realiza en el centro poblado de Triboline, provincia de Sivia, distrito de Huanta. Desde hace 15 años y durante todas las mañanas sale a trabajar junto a su esposo, ambos les gusta labrar su propia chacra, con el fin de que pueda mejorar su producción; pues con sus propias manos hace que los frutos mejoren cosecha tras cosecha, sin embargo le incomoda la falta de apoyo, pero no se amilana ante los problemas. El trabajo que realiza le es bastante rentable, ya que sus productos son llevados al centro de acopio de su comunidad, donde le pagan un buen precio. Sus planes para el futuro será ampliar su negocio y mejorar su estabilidad económica, para eso menciona que tiene que trabajar el doble. Es su tercer crédito con MFP, y asegura seguir cumpliendo lo pagos en sus respectivas fechas, le gusta trabajar en su banco comunal porque entre ellos existe el apoyo moral y económico. Los mil soles que solicita, lo utilizará para el mejoramiento y mantenimiento de sus plantaciones de cacao y café.
texts.en:
Rene is 30 years old and lives with her partner, with whom she has a 5 year old daughter called Mayli. They live in a wooden house built thanks to their own sweat. Rene grows and produces cocoa and coffee in the town of Triboline, in the province of Sivia, district of Huanta. 

As she has done over the last 15 years, every morning she goes to work with her husband. They both enjoy working in their farm to improve their production; with their own hands they better the fruits crop after crop. Even if the lack of support bothers her, she is not afraid of problems. Her work is quite profitable. The fruits are taken to the collection centre in her community, where she gets a good price for them. Her plans for the future are to expand his business and to improve her financial stability, and she knows she will have to work twice as much to get it. 

This is her third loan with MFP. She promises that she will continue to repay it on its due dates. She enjoys working with ther loan group because she gets moral and financial support. She will use the one thousand soles requested for the improvement and upkeep of her cocoa and coffee plantations.

loans.use: To weed and clean out her cocoa and coffee fields.

loans.name: G.s. Paso De Dios Group

texts.es: La señora Martina tiene 34 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 12 años respectivamente. La señora se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y peluches, los cuales distribuye de forma ambulante y en el mercado de Jinotepe. Ella ya tiene ocho años de dedicarse a esta actividad, la cual nació como una necesidad de obtener un ingreso por la falta de empleo que aqueja a nuestro país. Ella solicita este préstamo con el objetivo de invertirlo en la compra de más ropa, a ser distribuido entre sus clientes ya establecidos. Otra integrante del grupo es doña Marbelly, la cual tiene 28 años de edad, es casada y habita en el Rosario. Su esposo trabaja como vendedor. Ella además tiene 2 hijos de cuatro y seis años respectivamente. La señora se dedica a la venta de verduras, la cual distribuye de manera ambulante en una bicicleta. Ya la señora tiene 13 años dedicarse a esta actividad, la cual empezó por la falta de empleo y buscando una manera de brindar la alimentación a sus hijos. Ella solicita este préstamo con el propósito de comprar verduras y golosinas, con el objetivo de incrementar sus ventas para ganar más. Su sueño es comprar un tramo en el mercado nuevo de Jinotepe para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
Señora Martina is 34 years old, married and has 2 children, ages 9 and 12.  She sells used clothing and stuffed animals in the Jinotepe market in an itinerant manner.  She has been doing this for eight years.  She started this business because she needed to have an income and the unemployment is rampant in our country.  She is requesting this loan to purchase more clothing to distribute to her established customers.  

Another member of the group is Doña Marbelly who is 28 years old, married and lives in El Rosario.  Her husband works as a salesperson.  They also have 2 children, ages 4 and 6 months.  Doña Marbelly travels on her bicycle selling vegetables.  She has been doing this for 13 years and started because she was unemployed and looking for a way to feed her children.   She is requesting a loan to buy vegetables and candy to increase her sales and her income.  Her dream is to be able to buy a spot in the new market in Jinotepe to sell her products.

loans.use: To purchase used clothing, vegetables and candy

loans.name: Hermenegilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KUKULI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hermenegilda; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes que atiende desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia quiere ampliar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “KUKULI”.  The bank is located in Cusco District, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the Department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Hermenegilda.  She is 38, married, and has 3 children.  She divides her time with her grocery store that she takes care of from 6 am to 10 pm.  She sells basic supplies such as rice, sugar, milk and oil.  She would like to enlarge her grocery store and she is requesting the loan to buy products for it.

Hermenegilda thanks those who are part of this dream through the bank and loan and promises to make the payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to buy products for her grocery store

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is a 35-year-old mother of two who lives with her partner and elder son in the province of Limón, located near the Caribbean coast of Costa Rica. 

The loan consultant who has been working with Rosa has described her as a hardworking entrepreneur who makes punctual repayments. Rosa has proven herself to be a responsible client over the course of her first loan. This will be her second loan with Fundación Mujer. 

Rosa has a sewing business. The money she generates from her productive activity complements the salary earned by her partner, who works for a multinational banana producing company in the region. Rosa´s clients are mainly neighbours, acquaintances, family and friends who live in her community. She produces underwear, bathing suits and performs custom alterations.

Rosa plans to use this loan to invest in a new sewing machine as well as sewing materials (thread, fabric, elastic etc.). With an increase in working capital, Rosa is confident she will be able to expand her business and gain the ability to better satisfy the needs of her clients. Her goal is to increase the revenue from her sewing business in order to make a more significant contribution to family income. 

Every day, Rosa wakes up early to start sewing before she prepares breakfast and cleans the house. She does the majority of her sewing in the afternoons, and when she is extremely busy, Rosa hires somebody to help her.

loans.use: For the purchase of a sewing machine and sewing materials (elastic, fabric, thread)

loans.name: Josefa Herlinda

texts.es:
Josefa Herlinda C. T.
Josefa es de 50 años de edad, Soltera, es comerciante, actualmente se dedica a la confección, en dicha actividad tiene 9 años de experiencia, solicita su primer crédito para la compra de materia prima  de esa manera surtir sus productos lo cual es una inversión rentable y así mejorar sus ingresos económicos, según referencias la persona solicitante es responsable y trabajadora en el cual podrá realizar sus pagos correspondientes.
texts.en:
Josefa Herlinda C. T.
Josefa is 50 years old and single. She is a merchant. At present, she is a seamstress. She has been doing this activity for 9 years. She is asking for her first loan to purchase raw materials to diversify her products. This is a profitable investment and in this way she will improve her income. According to references, the applicant is a responsible and hardworking woman who will be able to make her payments.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials

loans.name: Jhon

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KUKULI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


El socio es el Sr. Jhon; el tiene 28 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio tiene un negocio de venta de artesanía junto con su esposa trabajan en este negocio y sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio trabaja desde las 9:00 a., hasta las 10:00 p.m, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como chompas, chalinas, collares y trabajos de arcilla.

 
El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Jhon belongs to the communal bank "Kukuli," which is located in the Cusco district, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

He is 28 years old, lives with a partner, and has 2 children.  He has a business selling handicrafts with his wife.  They work in this business to provide for their children.  He works from 9am until 10 pm.  Jhon wants to expand his business.  He requests a loan to buy merchandise such as sweaters, scarves, necklaces, and handicrafts made of clay.

Jhon is grateful to the people who make it possible for him to pursue his dream through these means, and he pledges to make his payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sweaters, scarves, necklaces and handicrafts made from clay

loans.name: G.s. Manos Unidas Group

texts.es: La señora Marta tiene 36 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 7, 10 y 13 años respectivamente. Ella tiene una panadería, localizada en su casa de habitación, ella horna dos veces por semana, vende el pan en una comunidad. Tiene 8 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, cabe señalarse desde niña aprendió este negocio de su mama ya que ella anteriormente se dedicaba a lo mismo. Ella solicita este préstamo con el objetivo de invertirlo en materia prima para la producción de pan. La otra integrante del grupo es doña Flor, la cual tiene 29 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de ocho y once años respectivamente. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de nacatamales y cosa de horno, los cales distribuye de manera ambulante elabora fritos de cerdo y sale a vender. Ella comenzó este negocio desde hace 7 años con el objetivo de tener un ingreso adicional al de su esposo para mantener a sus hijos. Cabe señalarse su esposo trabaja como albañil. Ella desea este crédito con el objetivo de invertirlo en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de nacatamales.
texts.en: Señora Marta is 36 years old, married and has 3 children who are 7, 10 and 13 years old respectively.  She has a bakery located in her home.  She bakes twice a week and sells her bread in the community.  She has been making her living in this way for 8 years.  It's worth noting that she learned her trade from her mother as a young girl, since her mother made her living in the same way.  She is requesting her loan with the intention of investing in raw materials for making bread.  The other member of the group is doña Flor, who 29 years old, married and has 2 children who are eight and eleven years old respectively.  She makes her living making "nacatamales" (a traditional Nicaraguan dish) and baked goods, which she sells as a street vendor.  She also makes pork sausage, which she sells on the street as well. She started her business 7 years ago with the goal of adding to her husband's income in order to support their children.  It's worth nothing that husband works as a bricklayer.  She wants this loan to invest in the purchase of supplies for making "nacatamales."

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto tiene 54 años, es soltero y gran parte de su tiempo lo dedica al trabajo. Tiene una modesta casa, pero muy acogedora, que esta hecha a base de madera, que él mismo construyó. Roberto se dedica al cultivo de cacao y plátano en el centro poblado de Triboline, ubicada en el distrito de Huanta. Desde hace 30 años trabaja solo en el campo, es así que desde las 6 de la mañana, con la salida del alba, Roberto empieza su vida rutinaria, arando, regando, y procurando que la plaga de insectos no perjudique sus cultivos, pero cuando es tiempo de cosecha necesita la ayuda de peones, para facilitar la extracción de sus frutos. Le encanta trabajar en su chacra porque le gusta mucho la naturaleza, a veces suele enojarse porque los peones no hacen el trabajo correcto como él desearía. Ahora se encuentra contento y tranquilo pues sabe que la venta de estos frutos le es rentable, ya que el cacao es comercializado en los centros de acopio de su pueblo, mientras que el plátano lo envía a la ciudad de Ayacucho, en la que cuenta con clientes que esperan la llegada de sus frutos de calidad. Sus planes para el futuro es comprar más lotes agrícolas, para aumentar su producción y de esa manera mejorar sus ventas. Es su primer crédito con MFP y asegura que no dejará de pagar sus cuotas, porque no quiere fallar a su banco comunal, ya que le dieron la confianza para trabajar juntos. Con Comprlos mil soles que solicita, podrá comprar abono para aplicar sobre sus tierras ya cultivadas de esa manera podrá preservar la calidad de sus frutos.
texts.en: Roberto is 54 years old, single, and spends the greater part of his time working.  He has a home that is modest, but very cozy, that he built himself out of wood.  Roberto cultivates cocoa and bananas in the village of Triboline, located in the Huanta district.  For 30 years he has worked alone in the fields.  From 6 in the morning, at daybreak, Roberto begins his routine life: tilling, watering, and ensuring that pests do not harm his crops.  But at harvest time he finds it necessary to have the assistance of hired workers to facilitate the harvesting of his crops.  He loves to work on his farm, because he really enjoys the natural setting.  But at times he gets angry if his hired workers don't do the work correctly, as he would like them to do it. Now he is content and tranquil, because he knows that the sale of his crops is profitable.  Cocoa is marketed in the collection centers in his town, while he sends his bananas to the city of Ayacucho, where he has customers that wait for the arrival of his quality fruit.  In the future, he plans to buy more agricultural land to increase his production and improve his sales.  This is his first loan with MFP, and he assures us that he will not fall behind on his payments because he does not want to let down his communal bank, since they gave him the confidence to work together.  With the 1,000 Peruvian soles he requests, he will be able to buy organic fertilizer to apply to his fields, since in this way he will be able to sustain the quality of his fruit.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Hugo Maximiliano

texts.es:
Hugo Maximiliano Z. T.
Hogo  es de 56 años de edad, casado, tiene tres hijas mujeres, es comerciante y actualmente se dedica  a  la venta de ropa típica  en la actividad tiene 9  años de experiencia, solicita su primer crédito para la compra de mercadería, lo cual le es de mucha utilidad para surtir sus productos para la clientela, siendo una persona responsable y trabajador,  y de esa manera podrá realizar sus pagos correspondientes.
texts.en: Hugo Maximiliano Z. T. is 56 years of age.  He is married and has three daughters.  He is in the business of selling typical clothing and has 9 years of experience doing so.  He is requesting this loan (his first) so that he can purchase merchandise in order to make products available for his clients.  He is responsible and hard-working and because of this, he'll be able to make his loan payments.

loans.use: Compra de mercaderia para la venta (To buy merchandise in order to sell)

loans.name: Jennifer Elizabeth

texts.es:
Jennifer de 19 años, tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa de caña, vive en una zona periurbana llamada Fortín caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y lomas. tiene un hijo de 7 meses con su esposo. 

Tiene una pequeña tienda en la parte delantera de su casa, ella y su esposo trabajan juntos en su tienda vendiendo arroz, azúcar, carnes etc. Trabajan desde las 08h00am hasta las 22h00pm todos los días. Ella quiere el préstamo para surtir mas su tienda con víveres como arroz, azúcar y carnes. 

En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa de cemento y poder así tener todos los servicios básicos, y expandir su tienda.
texts.en:
Jennifer, who is 19 years old, has a small store in her bamboo house.  She lives in the outskirts of the city in an area called Fortín, which is characterized by its dirt roads and hills.  She and her husband have a 7-month old son. 

She has a small store in the front of her house.  She and her husband work together in the store selling rice, sugar, meats. etc.  They work from 8am -10pm every day.  She wants the loan in order to stock up her store with provisions like rice, sugar and meats.

In the future, she wants to finish construction on a cement house and to be able to have basic services in her home.  She also wants to expand her store.

loans.use: Rice, sugar, meats

loans.name: Minerva Del Carmen

texts.es:
Minerva C. Gutiérrez tiene 58 años y vive en Cartagena con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos. Ella desde hace muchos años se dedica al oficio de repostera y elaboración de comidas para fiestas especialmente de banquetes. Como siempre le ha gustado hacer cursos, logró aprender el arte de repostería y preparación de comidas especiales, así como el de confección de cubrelechos, oficio con el cual   inició su primera idea  de negocio en el barrio  las Palmeras, donde anteriormente vivía; al hacer  el curso de cocina y repostería también se ingenió para sacarle frutos a lo que aprendió y  que le encanta preparar para su público; fue así como al cambiarse de vivienda, se fue al barrio el Socorro, donde emprendió el negocio de alimentos, apoyada por  un familiar que en la actualidad  lo ayuda mucho. Minerva en estas dos actividades en las  que se desempeña se siente muy feliz, pues ha logrado generar ingresos con lo que gradualmente ha estudiado y con lo que más le gusta hacer  que además  genera  utilidades con las que  contribuye para el sostenimiento familiar.

Su credickiva es su tercer  financiamiento  con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la que ha estado vinculada desde hace algo más de cuatro años, con este crédito comprará materiales e insumos para preparar postres y también se abrirá al campo de la mercancía variada como vestidos y cosméticos aprovechando que se acercan las fiestas de fin de año y sabe que ganará un dinero extra. Los financiamientos recibidos, han cambiado su  negocio  para bien, pues se nota  su crecimiento en la   infraestructura  de equipos y herramientas que ha adquirido, así mismo  el manejo de su microempresa,  le ha representado el fortalecimiento de su autonomía. Ella sueña con afianzar su nicho de mercado, ampliar su red de atención y poner un punto de ventas, donde incluya todo lo que ella con sus manos sabe hacer,  como la elaboración  de cortinas y cubrelechos, postres, ponques, comidas especiales y todo lo que en un futuro perfeccione a través del estudio y la dedicación
texts.en:
Minerva C. Gutiérrez is 58 years old and lives in Cartagena with her husband and two children. For several years she has worked as a pastry chef and caterer for parties, especially banquets. Minerva has always enjoyed taking courses, so she learned the art of baking and preparing specialty dishes such as comfort food. Her career started when she first thought of the idea for a business in the neighborhood of Las Palmeras where she previously lived. After completing her cooking and baking courses, Minerva began preparing the recipes she learned and found out she enjoyed cooking for the public. At that point, she moved to the neighborhood of Socorro where she started her food business. She has the support of her family who provide a great deal of assistance. Since she engages in two activities that make her happy, Minerva has been able to generate income which she can use to gradually continue her studies. She also likes the fact that the money she has earned helps to support her family.

Her Kiva loan is the third time she has received financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, an organization that she has been a member of for more than four years. With this loan, she will buy ingredients and supplies for preparing desserts. She also plans to start a new business selling different merchandise, such as dresses and cosmetics, so that she can take advantage of the year-end holidays and earn some extra money. The loans she has received have transformed her business for the better. It should be noted that she was able to increase her infrastructure by acquiring tools and equipment. Managing her own business has helped Minerva to become stronger and more independent. Her dreams are to establish a niche market, expand her network of customers, and set up a banquet hall where she can be in charge of all the details including the curtains, tablecloths, desserts, cakes, and specialty dishes. She presses toward the future with great detail and dedication in hopes of making everything perfect.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients & supplies for her catering business as well as merchandise to sell during the year-end holidays

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou M. est une jeune femme mariée de 25 ans qui habite à Yoff. Avant le mariage elle exerçait  l’activité de coiffeuse. Aussitôt après le mariage elle s’est départie de la coiffure pour s’occuper de son mari. Mais  Sous l’influence de ce dernier  elle s’est orientée vers  le commerce pour ne pas rester inactive. Elle achète des thioubs  qu’elle place en crédit auprès  de ses clients jusqu'à  la fin du mois. Elle est membre de la caisse de Yoff depuis février 2010 et n’y a jamais sollicité de prêt. Elle emprunte un montant de 150 000 frs destiné à l’achat de Thioubs. Ce financement lui permettra d’accroitre ses bénéfices et de diminuer la dépendance envers son mari. Son rêve est de mieux développer son activité et parvenir a voyager pour s’approvisionner en marchandises.
texts.en: Mrs. Fatou M. is a young married woman, 25 years old, who lives in Yoff. Before her marriage she used to work as a hairdresser. After her marriage she stopped working in that field in order to dedicate herself to taking care of her husband. However, with her husband’s encouragement, she developed an interest in commerce so as not to remain inactive. She purchases thioubs (traditional damask-type cloth) which she sells on credit, collecting payment from customers at the end of the month. She has joined the Yoff credit union in February 2010 and never requested a loan before. She is borrowing 150,000 West African Francs in order to purchase thioubs. This financing will allow her to increase her revenues and be less dependent on her husband. Her dream is to grow her business and to be able to travel in order to stock up on merchandise.

loans.use: Increasing working capital

loans.name: Arcoiris De Lerma Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama “Arcoíris de Lerma”, en él se encuentra la señora Elvia T. de 50 años de edad, ella nos comenta que tiene 5 hijos y 9 nietos. Su esposo se llama Andrés Martínez Alvarado el cual lleva 30 años trabajando de albañil. Su negocio es la venta de ropa, venta de dulces y frituras. Al principio la señora  se dedicaba a la siembra y cosecha de maíz, frijol, y aba, hacía también tortillas, cuidaba vacas y caballos, también lavaba y planchaba ropa. Ahora los créditos le seguirán ayudando para tener mayor ganancia en su negocio y su ilusión es que sus nietos tengan una mejor calidad de vida. En este grupo también se encuentra la señora Mónica Martínez T., quien es hija de la señora Elvia T.,  Mónica tiene 22 años de edad, un hijo de 5 años y se dedica a la aplicación de uñas, planchado de cejas y rizado de pestañas, actualmente estudia estilismo profesional, su crédito lo invertirá en material y con sus próximos créditos piensa construir una accesoria para poner una estética.
texts.en:
This group is called “Arcoíris de Lerma” (Rainbow of Lerma) and one of its members is Sra. Elvia T.. She is 50 years old and says she has five children and nine grandchildren. Her husband is named Andrés Martínez Alvarado and has worked as a mason for 30 years. Elvia has a business selling clothes, candy, and fritters. At first she made her living by growing and harvesting corn, kidney beans, and lima beans. She also made tortillas, raised cows and horses, and took in clothes to launder and iron. With the loans she is now able to generate more profits from her business. Elvia dreams of seeing her grandchildren have a better quality of life.

Another member of this group is Sra. Mónica Martínez T., who is Sra. Elvia’s daughter. Mónica is 22 years old and has a five year old son. She works as a nail technician, but she also performs eyebrow shaping and eyelash curling. Mónica is currently studying to become a professional stylist. Her loan will be invested in materials. With the subsequent loans she plans to receive, she hopes to build a salon where she can set up her aesthetics practice.

loans.use: Operating capital to reinvest into the business

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Señor José Luis trabaja en la venta de comida que está ubicado en su casa de habitación. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, lo inicio con recursos propios  anteriormente él no tenía trabajo y necesitaba una forma de generar ingresos para su familia,  con el tiempo logro aumentar la diversidad de platillos que ofrece. el tiene que cuidar por su familia, actualmente la situación que atraviesan es difícil pues los alimentos están muy caros, es por eso el motivo que solicita este financiamiento para la compra de  granos básicos, aceite, verduras y comprar algunas mesas.  Es muy trabajador y está muy agradecido por el apoyo brindado por lo que trabajara muy duro.
texts.en: Sr.  José Luis sells food from his home and has been in this business for more than three years.  He started with his own resources because he was unemployed and needed a way to generate income for his family.  Over time he was able to diversify the types of dishes he offers.  José wants to take care of his family, but his current situation is difficult because the cost of food is expensive.  For this reason, he is requesting this loan so that he can buy basic grains, oil, vegetables, as well as acquire a few tables.  He is a hard worker and feels grateful for the support that has been provided.

loans.use: Purchase basic grains, oil, vegetables, and tables

loans.name: Jesus Santa

texts.es:
Jesús Santa C. Y.
Jesús Santa es de 51  años de edad, casada, no  tiene hijos, es trabajadora domestica, y actualmente se dedica como comerciante, en la actividad tiene 12 años de experiencia, solicita su tercer crédito, para surtir su negocio para la venta, el cual es una inversión rentable, sus referencias personales indican que es una persona responsable y trabajadora, por tal motivo no tendrá inconvenientes para pagar el préstamo.
texts.en: Jesús Santa Chaclán Y. is 51 years old, married, and does not have children.  She works hard as a housekeeper, but she is also a merchant who has 12 years of business experience.  Jesús is requesting her third loan so that she can restock her retail business since this opportunity is a profitable investment.  Her personal references indicate she is a responsible and hardworking individual, so she should not have any problems repaying this loan.

loans.use: Operating capital to acquire more merchandise

loans.name: Ana Carolina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KUKULI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Ana Carolina; ella tiene 49 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de una academia norteña donde enseña el baile de la marinera que es un baile típico del norte de Peru, ella es la administradora y tiene profesores que enseña este baile a diferentes personas ya sean niños, jóvenes y adultos, ella atiende desde las 4:00 p.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,la socia quiere implementar la academia.  La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar espejos, televisor y Dvd y de esta manera implementar la academia.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “KUKULI” communal bank; the bank is located in Cusco district, Cusco province, and Cusco state.

The member is Mrs. Ana Carolina; she is 49 years old, married, and has 2 children. She alternates her daily activities with business at a dance school where she teaches dances typical of northern Peru. She is the director and has teachers who teach this dance to different people including children, youth, and adults. She works at the school from 4:00 PM to 8:00 PM; she wishes to open an academy. The member seeks a loan to buy mirrors, a TV, and DVD and in this way open an academy.

The member is grateful to those who are helping her reach this dream and she promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: Buy mirrors, TV, and DVD to open her academy

loans.name: Victor Rafael

texts.es:
Víctor Rafael D. León R. 
Víctor  es D. 22 años D. edad, casado, tiene una hija , es tejedor , actualmente se dedica como comerciante, en la actividad tiene 4  años D. experiencia, solicita su tercer crédito, para ampliación D. capital, las referencias personales y D. créditos anteriores indican que es una persona responsable y trabajadora por lo que no tendrá dificultades para efectuar los pagos correspondientes.
texts.en: Víctor Rafael D. León R. is 22 years old, married, and has a daughter.  He is a weaver, but currently works as a merchant.  Victor has four years of experience and is requesting his third loan so that he can increase his capital.  His personal references and credit history indicate that he is a responsible and hardworking individual who will not have difficulty completing his payments.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise & increase his capital

loans.name: Maria Virginia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KUKULI”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria Virginia; ella tiene 49 años de edad y es divorciada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza, ella vende en forma independiente ofreciendo a las instituciones y a las personas en general, ella vende perfumes, lápiz labiales y cremas, la socia quiere tener una tienda para poder vender los productos de belleza.  La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir y comprar los productos de belleza al por mayor.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Maria Virginia belongs to the “Kukuli” Communal Bank.  It is located in the Cusco district, which belongs to the Cusco province, Cusco department.

Maria Virginia is 49 years old, divorced, and has three children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and the business of selling beauty products.  She sells in an independent manner to institutions and the general public.  She sells perfume, lipstick, and creams.  She wants to have a store where she will be able to sell the beauty products.

She is requesting the loan to buy beauty products wholesale.

She thanks everyone who makes it possible for her to pursue her dreams through these means.  She pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy beauty products wholesale

loans.name: Teresa Jahaira

texts.es: Teresa Jahaira es una madre de familia de 30 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, ella busca la forma de salir adelante con su negocio,  tiene una gran variedad de clientes que asisten a su negocio, ella es una persona muy tranquila y que disfruta de hablar con sus clientes. Teresa desea ampliar su negocio para lograr adquirir más ganancias siempre le ha gustado trabajar para mantener a su familia. Se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez un crédito con el objetivo de comprar pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos y trajes. Ella es una persona bastante entregada a su familia y que siempre está dispuesta a ayudar a los que la necesitan. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Teresa Jahaira is a 30 year old mother. She sells clothing and is looking for ways to succeed in her business. Teresa has a variety of customers who come to her business. She is a peaceful person who enjoys talking with her customers.

Teresa wants to expand her business so that she can generate more income. She always enjoys working in order to support her family. Teresa found it necessary to request her first loan so that she can buy trousers, shirts, skirts, dresses, and suits. She is very devoted to her family and always willing to help those who are in need. The people who know her consider her to be a quiet and responsible woman.

loans.use: Purchase trousers, shirts, skirts, dresses, and suits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Operating capital for buying materials

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia, de 27 años, convive con Amarildo, de 28 años, producto de su amor nació Miguel de 8 años, al cual cuidan y educan en una casa alquilada, en la localidad de Patay. Hace ya 8 años que se dedica a la siembra de arveja, papa y hortalizas; el cual los vende en el mercado central de su localidad; para que sus productos alcancen mayor demanda ella los trabaja y cuida con dedicación junto a su esposo; todas las mañanas desde muy temprano sale en busca de plantaciones de gladiolos, los compra y los vende en la capital, el negocio es favorable por ello viaja una vez por semana a la capital.  Dentro de unos meses cosechará una gran cantidad de hortalizas, con ello podrá adquirir mayor capital y sembrará arvejas, con lo cual aumentará sus ahorros para comprar su casa propia. Es el séptimo crédito con MFP y está segura que podrá salir adelante con la ayuda de su banco comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará semillas de arveja, abono y medicinas para el cultivo de arveja que sembrará y cuidará durante cuatro meses.
texts.en:
Sonia, age 27, lives with 28 year old Amarildo.  They have an eight year old son that they are caring for and educating in a rented house in Patay.

For eight years she has been planting peas, potatoes, and vegetables.  She sells them at the central market in her area.  In order for her products to be in greater demand, she and her husband work and take care of them with dedication. She leaves very early every morning looking for gladiola fields.  She buys gladiolas, and she sells them in the capital.  The business is profitable, so she travels to the capital once a week.

In a few months time she will harvest a large quantity of vegetables.  Then she will be able to get more capital, and she will plant peas.  This will increase her savings to buy her own house.

This is her seventh loan with MFP.  She is certain that she will be will be able to get ahead with the help of her communal bank.  She will use the requested loan to buy pea seeds, fertilizer, and products to treat disease for the peas that she will plant and take care of for four months.

loans.use: To buy pea seeds and sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Victor Abigail

texts.es:
Víctor Abigail Hernández B. 
Víctor  es de 29 años de edad, casado, no tiene hijos,  es Bachiller Industrial y Perito en electricidad  en la actividad y actualmente se dedica  como taxista tiene 1 año  de experiencia, solicita su primer crédito para la compra de repuestos para reparación de vehículo, lo cual le es de mucha utilidad en su trabajo, siendo una persona responsable y trabajador y según referencias es una persona responsable y trabajadora en el cual podrá realizar sus pagos sin inconvenientes.
texts.en: Víctor Abigail Hernández B. is 29 years old, married, and does not have children.  He has a bachelor’s degree in industrial and electrical engineering, but he currently works as a taxi driver and has one year of experience.  Víctor is requesting his first loan so that he can buy spare parts to repair his vehicle, which he needs for his work.  According to his references, Víctor is a responsible and hardworking individual, so he should be able to complete his payments without any delays.

loans.use: Purchase spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Jennypher Carolina

texts.es: Jennypher es de 21 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos varones y dos  mujeres, es estudiante, actualmente se dedica ala elaboración de bolsones (mochilas),  en la actividad tiene 5 años de experiencia, solicita un credito para ampliación de capital, ya que necesita producir mas port la razon de que su negocio tiene demanda de clientes, sus antecedentes indican que es un persona responsablelos y lo creditos que ha tenido en esta institución los ha cancelado sin problema de atraso, la inversion que hace es rentable y la solicitante posee la capacidad para realizar los pagos mensuales, con lo que espera mejorar su ingresos y su condición de vida.
texts.en: Jennypher Carolina R. Gonzales is 21 years old, married, and has two sons and two daughters.  She is a student, but she also manufactures backpacks and has five years of experience.  Jennypher is requesting her fourth loan to increase her capital and views this opportunity as a profitable investment.  She has the capacity to complete her monthly payments.

loans.use: Ampliacion de capital de trabajo

loans.name: Hilda Eloisa

texts.es:
Hilda Elisa S. S. 
Hilda  es de 21 años de edad, soltera, se dedica a la elaboración de cortes típicos, en la actividad tiene 5 años de experiencia, solicita su segundo crédito para la compra de materia prima, es factible autorizar a la solicitante, en virtud que la misma es utilizada para capital de trabajo. Según referencia de la solicitante es una persona responsable, Por lo que no tendrá dificultades para efectuar los pagos correspondientes.
texts.en: Hilda Elisa S. S. is 21 years old and single.  She manufactures traditional clothing and has five years of experience in this business.  Hilda is requesting her second loan so that she can buy materials and has received authorization to use the funds as operating capital.  According to her references, Hilda is a responsible perS., so she should not have any difficulties completing her payments.

loans.use: Purchase materials

loans.name: Antonio Ignacio

texts.es:
Antonio Ignacio Hernández Hernández
Antonio es de 39 años de edad, casado, tiene y tres  hijos varones y ocho hijas  mujeres, es jornalero y actualmente  es artesano en la elaboración de ollas y sartenes de barro, en la actividad lleva 29 años de experiencia, solicita su primer crédito para ampliación de capital y  compra de barro plomo y azufre y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos económicos del mismo como el bienestar de su familia en general, según  referencias indican que es una persona responsable y trabajadora y según la actividad a la que se dedica podrá realizar sus pagos mensuales sin inconvenientes.
texts.en:
Antonio Ignacio Hernández Hernández
Antonio is 39 years old, is married and has three sons and eight daughters. Antonio is a day laborer and currently works as an artisan making clay pots and pans, which he has done for 29 years. Antonio is asking for his first loan to increase his capital and to buy clay, lead and sulphur. This will help him improve his income and his family’s general wellbeing. His references indicate that he is a responsible and hardworking man and his work will allow him to make his monthly payments without any problems.

loans.use: To buy raw materials, lead, sulphur and clay.

loans.name: Kuña Rory Aty Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Emprendedoras D. la Ciudad D. Villa Hayes Chaco actualmente  se encuentra repitiendo el ciclo por motivo D. que 6 D. sus integrantes desertaron por motivos personales.
En su mayoría las clientas se dedican a la  venta D. artículos D. mercerías, ventas D. escobas que los maridos fabrican, despensa  y otras actividades. 
Y gracias al crédito concedido por la Fundación Paraguaya y Kiva tienen el deseo D. superarse cada vez más, y seguir avanzando. 
Así una D. las integrantes es la señora Karina quien posee una pequeña despensa que provee D. productos D. primera necesidad a todos sus vecinos ya que en la comunidad no hay muchos negocios.
Ella posee una clientela segura, y así ayuda a si familia con el ingreso con la alimentación diaria que es lo más importante comenta ella.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra D. mercaderías para su negocio como, yerba, azúcar, harina, fideos, leche, aceite, y otros.

Estas son las actividades D. cada miembro del grupo:
Karina - Despensa 
Isabel - Venta D. Bebidas 
Prudencia - Venta D. Ropa 
Lorena - Venta D. Carne 
Mirta - Venta D. Articulos D. Merceria 
Crusilda - Venta D. Minutas 
Esmilce - Despensa 
Fidelina - Venta D. Mercaderias D. Consumo Masivo 
Lidia - Venta D. Articulos D. Merceria 
Higinia - Venta D. tortas 
Modesta - Venta D. Escobas 
Dominga - Venta D. Articulos D. Mercerias 
Prissilia - Venta D. Lencerias 
Mercedes - Venta D. Verduras 
Rocio - Despensa 
Elizabeth - Venta D. Escobas
texts.en:
The Enterprising Women of Ciudad D. Villa Hayes Chaco Communal Bank is currently repeating a cycle because six of the members left for personal reasons.  Most of the members sell sewing supplies, sell brooms that their husbands make, have a small store, or have other businesses.

Thanks to the loan from the Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva, they have the desire to improve themselves and to keep going forward.

Karina, one of the members, has a small store.  She sells basic needs products to all of her neighbors because there are not many businesses in her community.  She has fixed customers.  That is how she helps her family get money for their daily food, which she says is the most important thing.

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise like herbs, sugar, flour, noodles, milk, oil, and other things for her business.

These are the activities of each member of the group:

Karina – Small store
Isabel – Sells drinks
Prudencia – Sells clothes
Lorena – Sells meat
Mirta – Sells notions
Crusilda – Sells food
Esmilce - Small store
Fidelina – Sells food staples
Lidia - Sells notions
Higinia – Sells cakes
Modesta – Sells brooms
Dominga - Sells notions
Prissilia – Sells lingerie
Mercedes – Sells vegetables
Rocio – Small store

loans.use: Purchase sugar, flour, milk and oil to restock store

loans.name: Donga

texts.fr: donga est une femme mariée, elle est mère de 4 enfants, elle exerce comme activité génératrice de revenu le commerce de charbons de bois. elle s'approvisionne à l'intérieur du pays plus précisément dans la localité de Wahala. elle a une ancienneté de 8 ans  dans son commerce. le premier crédit qu'elle sollicite de WAGES va lui permettre de s'approvisionner avec une trentaine de sacs de charbons de bois.
texts.en: Donga is a married woman and the mother of four. She makes a living by selling charcoal. She stocks up in the interior of the country, more specifically in Wahala. She has eight years of experience in this line of business. She is now seeking her first loan from WAGES, which will allow her to stock about thirty bags of charcoal.

loans.use: Purchasing bags of charcoal

loans.name: Jessica Liliana

texts.es:
Jessica de 23 años, tiene una tienda de víveres en la parte delantera de su casa. Vive en una zona periurbana llamada Fortín caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y lomas. 

Hace cuatro meses ella empezó con su tienda para ayudar con los gastos familiares a su esposo y así dales una mejor vida a sus dos hijos de 5 años y el otro de 8 meses. Trabaja en su tienda vendiendo víveres y dulces desde las 05h45am hasta las 22h00pm. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar lácteos, enlatados y detergentes para su tienda. En el futuro quiere tener un panadería y que sus hijos tenga una mejor vida económica.
texts.en:
Jessica is 23 years old and has a small store in the front of her home. She lives in a semi urban area called Fortín which is characterized by its dirt paths and hills.

Four months ago she began her store to help her husband with the family expenses and to give her family a better quality of life especially her two children who are 5 years old and 8 months old. Jessica works in her store by selling provisions and candy from 5:45 in the morning until 10:00 p.m.

With the loan she wants to buy dairy products, canned goods and detergents for her store. In the future she wants a bakery and that her children will have a better economic life.

loans.use: To buy dairy products, canned goods, and detergents.

loans.name: Isabel Cristina

texts.es:
Isabel Cristina Teherán B., vive en el barrio Nelson Mandela de la ciudad de Cartagena en el departamento de Bolívar, ella y su cónyuge tiene el negocio de ofrecer el servicio de “fumigaciones Nelson González”, el cual  que inició desde hace ya cuatro años   de manera domiciliaría en su barrio y ahora   se ha extendido en toda la ciudad y gradualmente esta ganado reconocimiento.
Su cónyuge, en la fotografía con Isabel,  se encarga de las visitas puerta a puerta   y esta última  de la administración de los recursos. Este es el segundo financiamiento a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la que lleva un año de estar vinculada, y con la que hoy ha logrado mantener un nuevo capital de trabajo por sus financiamientos, Isabel cuenta que hoy cuenta con dos tanques de fumigación y una bomba de motor para fumigar; con su  credickiva espera reparar la bomba del motor , que últimamente no esta funcionando a un cien por ciento  y también comprará materiales e insumos que utiliza en cada oportunidad. Su principal desafío es tener un local para lograr realizar su negocio con las certificaciones que se requieren en el ejercicio de su actividad, las cuales están tramitando.
texts.en:
Isabel Cristina Teherán B. lives in the Nelson Mandela neighborhood of the city of Cartagena in the department of Bolívar. She and her husband have the service business “fumigaciones Nelson González” (Nelson González Fumigacion). They began the business out of their home in their neighborhood four years ago, and now it has extended throughout the city and is gradually gaining recognition. Her husband, seen in the photograph with Isabel, is in charge of door-to-door visits, and she is charged with administration.

This is their second loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which they have been involved for a year. They want to obtain new working capital with the financing.

Isabel states that they have two fumigation tanks and one motorized pump for fumigation. With their loan they hope to repair the pump, which lately hasn’t been working well, so that it is 100% functional. They will also buy materials that they will use on each job. Their main challenge is having a place where they can conduct their business which has the certifications required to carry out their activities, which they are processing.

loans.use: To repair a motorized pump that isn't 100% functional.  She will also buy materials that will be used on each job.

loans.name: Gerardo Jose

texts.es: Gerardo José tiene 38 años, su actividad es la venta de productos varios. Hace más de 4 años. El es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable pues sabe que tiene hacerse cargo de sus 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Por lo que además también sale a vender a la calle sus productos, el siempre se esfuerza por proporcionarle a sus clientes lo que ellos le solicitan. Este negocio lo aprendió por su propia cuenta y fue por ahorros que tenía conservado que poco a poco fue ofreciendo pan, huevos, cuajada entre otras cosas. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima y ofrecer variedad.
texts.en: Gerardo José is 38 years old; he works selling various products and has done so for more than 4 years. He is a very hardworking and responsible man since he has 3 underage children under his care. He also sells his products in the street and is always working hard to give his customers what they need. Gerardo learned this trade by himself and through his savings that he accumulated little by little he was able to sell bread, eggs, and curd among other items. This is why Gerardo needs to loan to buy raw materials and to give variety to his customers.

loans.use: Work capital.

loans.name: Lucio Valerio

texts.es: Lucio Valerio F. de 60 años de edad, ha sido un hombre muy responsable durante toda su vida, quien siempre se ha esmerado por darle lo mejor a su familia. Él reside en Izalco, en el departamento de Sonsonate en donde vive junto a su esposa y una hija de 15 años de edad. Lucio se dedica a la venta de mochilas, carteras, cinchos bolsones y otros productos similares, el negocio se encuentra ubicado en su casa de habitación en donde desde hace más de 18 años que trabaja de esta manera, por lo que la mayoría de personas de Izalco lo conocen y cuenta con las recomendaciones de ellos. Su esposa le ayuda a atender el negocio, haciéndolo la única fuente de ingresos que poseen, por lo que desea poder mejorarlo. Lucio solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir su negocio con nuevos estilos de bolsones y mochilas, así mismo poder comprar cinchos de diferentes materiales y de esta forma abarcar diferentes tipos de mercado para mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en: Lucio Valerio F. is 60 years old; he has been a very responsible man for all of his life and has always worked hard to give the best to his family. He lives in Izalco in the Sonsonate department where he lives with his wife and a 15 year old daughter. Lucio sells backpacks, purses, belts and other similar products. The business is located in his home, he has worked for 18 years in this field and the majority of the people in Izalco know him and he depends on their recommendation which is why he wants to improve his business. Lucio needs the loan to stock his business with new styles and varieties of purses and backpacks as well as belts in different materials to improve his sales.

loans.use: To buy backpacks and belts to sell.

loans.name: Edwin Alexander

texts.es: Edwin Alexander S. D. de 22 años de edad es un joven emprendedor el cual trabaja desde muy joven en su propio negocio. Él es hijo único, el cual reside en el municipio de Ilopango, en donde vive junto a sus padres los cuales también se dedican a trabajar en sus negocios propios. Edwin posee una tienda en la cual comercializa diferentes productos alimenticios y de primera necesidad, la tienda se encuentra en su casa de habitación en donde Edwin se dedica a atenderla. Él solicita un préstamo a Integral con el mayor de los deseos de poder surtir aún más su negocio, ya que esto le asegura contar con más clientela, ya que es la tienda con más productos en el lugar, así mismo comprar por mayor le ayuda mucho a Edwin debido a que puede obtener los productos alimenticios y de primera necesidad a menores precios. Edwin es un joven muy trabajador quien no sólo se dedica a su propio negocio sino también a estudiar y a pagarse sus estudios gracias al sudor de su frente.
texts.en: Edwin Alexander S. D. is 22 years old he is an enterprising young man that has worked from a very young age in his own business. He is an only child and lives in the Ilopango municipality where he lives with his parents who also have their own businesses. Edwin has a store and he sells different food products and basic household goods, the store is in his home. He needs the loan from Integral (Kiva’s field partner) to stock his store since that will assure that he will have more customers since his store has the most products in the area and to buy things wholesale since he can have foodstuffs and basic household goods at lower prices. Edwin is a very hardworking young man who not only has his own business but he also goes to school and pays for his education thanks to all of his hard work.

loans.use: To buy basic household goods.

loans.name: Neftalí Simeón

texts.es: Neftalí Simeón P. R. de 26 años de edad, reside en el municipio de Soypango, lugar en el cual vive junto a su compañera de vida y una pequeña hija de un año de edad. Neftalí posee una panadería propia la cual le compro a un cuñado y en la cual ha ido invirtiendo poco a poco, comprando todas las herramientas necesarias para la elaboración del pan y así mimo ha ido haciendo mejoras en el local, con el fin de poder contar con un mejor ambiente laboral. Neftalí cuenta con 5 repartidores de pan los cuales día con día entregan el pan en bicicleta por diferentes colonias. El negocio es bastante estable y así mismo le permite brindarle trabajo a otras personas, es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo con el deseo de poder mejorar su panadería comprando un horno industrial, debido a que el que posee en la actualidad es un horno artesanal; así mismo Neftalí quiere poseer mayor cantidad de materia prima como harina, manteca y otros más para hacer su trabajo más rápido y eficiente el cual no solo beneficie a su familia sino también a sus empleados.
texts.en: Neftalí Simeón P. R. is 26 years old and lives in the Soypango municipality where he lives with his life partner and little girl that is a year old. Neftalí has his own bakery that he bought from a brother-in-law and has invested in it little by little buying all of the tools necessary to make bread as well as making improvements in the place so that he can have a better working environment. Neftalí has 5 delivery people who each day deliver bread by bicycle to different neighborhoods. The business is very stable and it gives work to other people. Neftalí needs the loan since he has a traditional oven and he wants to buy an industrial oven he also wants to have a greater quantity of raw materials like flour, grease and other items to make the bread faster and more efficiently; that not only will help his family but also his employees.

loans.use: To buy raw materials to make bread and to buy an oven.

loans.name: Alba Yanira

texts.es: Alba Yanira V. D.  B. D. 38 años D. edad, resiD. en el pueblo D. San Juan Opico, en donD. resiD. junto a su esposo, quien es una persona muy responsable con su familia, y así mismo vive junto a cuatro hijos D. 17, 14, 9 y 7 años D. edad, quienes se dedican a estudiar gracias al enorme esfuerzo D. sus padres. Alba es una señora muy trabajadora quien siempre esta dispuesta a dar lo mejor D. si para brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Ella trabaja comercializando ropa para mujeres, hombres y niños, así mismo venD. zapatos y sandalias, productos los cuales comercializa en: Sitio GranD., Las granadillas y otros lugares D. Opico, los cuales son muy conocidos y que cuentan con una gran afluencia D. personas. Alba posee muchos clientes quienes incluso le hacen pedido D. ropa, es por esto que Alba desea contar con el dinero necesario para comprar toda la ropa y zapatos necesarios para invertir en el negocio y D. esta manera mejorar sus ventas, lo cual es su mayor prioridad.
texts.en: Alba Yanira V. D. B. is 38 years old and lives in the San Juan Opico town with her husband. She is a very responsible person and lives with her four children of 17, 14, 9 and 7 years of age who are going to school thanks to the huge efforts of their parents. Alba is a very hardworking woman who is always ready to give her best and give her all for her family. She works selling clothing for women, men and children as well as shoes and sandals that she sells in Sitio GranD., Las granadillas and other places of Opico that are very well known and have large crowds. Alba has many customers that ask for her clothing which is why Alba wants to have the money necessary to buy all of the clothing and shoes necessary to invest in the business and that will improve her sales, which is her main priority.

loans.use: To buy clothing and shoes to sell.

location.town: San Juan Opico, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: work capital

loans.name: Jairo Luis

texts.es: Jairo Luis se dedica al negocio de la joyería hace mas de 21 años que se dedica a este negocio. Sus inicios se dan desde muy joven pues anteriormente solo era ayudante poco a poco fue aprendiendo todo lo necesario para mejorar cada día actualmente el tiene su propio negocio en donde realiza diferentes trabajos para sus clientes como son pulsera, cadenas, anillos, aretes, dijes entre otras cosas ya que sus clientes le encargan una gran variedad. El financiamiento que solicita es por primera vez con el comprara oro que es importante  para realizar sus prendas.
texts.en: Jairo Luis has had a jeweler’s shop for more than 21 years. He began his work from a very young age since he was only a helper and little by little he started learning everything necessary to improve each day.  At present he has his own business where he does different works for his customers like bracelets, chains, rings, earrings among other items that his customers commission him to do. This will be his first loan and he will buy gold which is important to make his items.

loans.use: Work capital.

loans.name: Mariana Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Mariana Del Socorro, tiene 60 años es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos, pero solamente 1 está a su cargo. Ella se dedica a una pulpería  sus compras las realiza en el mercado y algunas veces los camiones llegan a dejarle los productos.  Ella dio inicio con este negocio desde hace 2 años, ante la gran necesidad que tenia ya que necesitaba empezar a pensar en su futuro. Ella por supuesto, desea seguir continuando con su negocio, es por eso que cada día se levanta con mucho entusiasmo para atender a sus clientes. El crédito será invertido en la compra de golosinas, refrescos, detergentes y granos básicos. Su deseo es proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda que son muy necesarias.
texts.en: Mrs. Mariana Del Socorro is 60 years old, is a single mother and has 2 children but only 1 is under her care. She has a general store, she buys her products in the market and sometimes trucks come in to leave her merchandise. She started this business 2 years ago since she needed to think about her future. She wants to keep her business and each day she gets up with a lot of enthusiasm to take care of her customers. The loan will be used to buy candy, refreshments, detergents and basic grains. Her wish is to improve her home since it is necessary.

loans.use: Work capital.

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela P. is a 61-year-old married woman who supports her family by operating three business ventures: a general store, food vending and motorcycle businesses. She lives in Purok Mahigugma-on, Barangay Maricalum, Sipalay City, Negros Occidental. She has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon since 2007 and has improved her living conditions with the help of her loans from NWTF and through her own efforts. By working hard in her general store, food vending and motorcycle businesses, she is gradually making her family more economically stable. She now earns an average monthly income of $117. 

Adela is now borrowing 16,000 PHP so that she can purchase more items to sell and for motorcycle maintenance. This will be her 7th loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon. Her previous loan of 13,000 PHP, which she paid off well within its term, was just another step in her journey toward economic freedom. Adela aspires to elevate her family's living conditions and ensure their future well being by following the  Dungganon way. 

About NWTF:
In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work.

Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking the link to the NWTF Kiva lending team on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: Additional capital and maintenance for her transport business

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: El Señor Roberto, Vallegrandino, nacido en agosto de 1985, concubinado con la Sra. Verónica, con un hijo que se encuentra en edad escolar, Hace 15 años que viven y trabajan en los amarillos, a 15 Km de la carretera entrando por Limoncito Carretera Cañada II, tiene tierra mediante el sindicato Agrario Los amarillos, el se dedica a la agricultura, siembra Maíz y Sorgo para hacer Escobas, Arroz, Papa y así también verduras para su consumo diario, con el dinero del crédito preparara la tierra para la siembra de maíz, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Roberto is a native of the Vallegrande province and was born in August 1985; he shares his life with his live-in partner Verónica, and they have a son of school age. For 15 years they have been living and working in Los Amarillos, located 15 km from Limoncito along the Cañada II Highway. Thanks to the farmers’ union of Los Amarillos he has been endowed with some land, and he engages in agriculture planting maize, sorghum bicolor used in the production of brooms, rice, potatoes as well as vegetable for their daily needs. The loan he is requesting will be used to invest in to prepare his land and to plant maize. He is very thankful to this institution for the support he has received.

loans.use: To increase his working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a sewing machine, invest and increase her operational capital.

loans.name: Alexandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Alexandra de 37 años, vive en el Guasmo de Guayaquil, tiene una pequeña tienda de legumbres y frutas. Es madre soltera con tres hijos. 

Inicio el negocio hace 7 años atrás porque no había una tienda de verduras y frutas por donde vivía, poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación a podido aumenta el negocio con mas frutas. Trabaja desde las 06h30am hasta las 22h00pm de lunes a domingo. Un promedio de las ventas de cada vegetal es de $ 0.75 c/u. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, vegetales y frutas para su negocio. En el futuro quiere comprar un vehiculo para movilizar todos los vegetales que necesita.
texts.en:
Alexandra is 37 years old and lives in the Guasmo of Guayaquil; she has a small store where she sells vegetables and fruits. She is a single mother with three children.

Alexandra began this business 7 years ago because there wasn’t a vegetable or fruit store where she lived. Little by little and with hard work and dedication she was able to increase her business with more fruits. She works form 6:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. Monday through Sunday. The average sale of each vegetable is $ 0.75 p/u.

With this loan she wants to buy rice, vegetables and fruits for her business. In the future she wants to buy a car to move all of the vegetables that she needs.

loans.use: To buy rice, vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Aurora Elena

texts.es: Aurora Elena tiene 63 años es madre soltera. La señora tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación una pulpería muy surtida, la cual es administrada personalmente por ella. Sus ventas son siempre de contado, igualmente tiene que comprar al contado. Ella empezó con este negocio desde hace 25 años, este dio inicio cuando no tenía un empleo que le generara ganancias, sin embargo ella pensó que la pulpería era rentable, por lo que decidió comenzar con este negocio. El crédito solicitado por la señora será invertido en la compra de inventario para la pulpería, principalmente granos básicos, ya que desea surtirla. Ahora desea establecer una tienda de ropa para aumentar el inventario y las ganancias.
texts.en: Aurora Elena is 63 years old and is a single mother. Aurora has a convenience store in her home which she manages herself and it is very well stocked. Her sales are always paid in full as she also has to pay at the time of purchase. She began her business some 25 years ago and she began when she didn’t have a job that would give her income, she thought that the store would be profitable which is why she started this business. The loan will be used to buy inventory for her general store, mainly basic grains since she wants to stock it. She now wishes to set up a clothing store to increase her inventory and earnings.

loans.use: Work capital.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy S. is a married woman who lives in Purok Orchids, Barangay Talagacay, Hinoba-an, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating three business ventures: she runs a general store; she also buys un-milled rice from farmers and after drying the grains, sends it to the rice mill for processing and sells the polished rice; and she raises and fattens pigs in her backyard. 

Her husband Ignacio S., who is 36 years old, works as a farmer to earn his living, and also helps in his wife's business activities. They have five children who are between the ages of 2 and 11 years old. One of the children has work, three are in school and the youngest is still at home.

Mercy joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 1999 because she aspired for something better for her family. With the help of her past 18 loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Mercy has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of 17,000 PHP helped her earn a monthly profit of about $140, raising the family's standard of living.  

This time, for her 19th cycle loan, she is borrowing 17,000 PHP, which she intends to add to her own working capital to fund her business operations so that she can continue to save up for her children's future education and for business expansion. Mercy S. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF: 
In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work.

Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking the link to the NWTF Kiva lending team on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: Purchase more stock to sell

loans.name: Prescila

texts.en:
