Prescila A. is a 50-year-old married woman who supports her family by operating two business ventures: a general store and a farming business. She lives in Sitio Tunga, Barangay Dalingding, Daanbantayan, Cebu. She has been a member of NWTF-Project Dungganon since 2008 and has improved her living conditions with the help of her loans from NWTF and through her own efforts. By working hard in her general store and farming businesses, she is gradually making her family more economically stable. She now earns an average monthly income of about $115. 

Prescila is now borrowing 12,000 PHP so that she can purchase more stock to sell. This will be her 6th loan from NWTF-Project Dungganon. Her previous loan of 12,000 PHP, which she paid off well within its term, was just another step in her journey toward economic freedom. Prescila aspires to elevate her family's living conditions and ensure their future well being by following the Dungganon way.

About NWTF: 
In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. 

Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking the link to the NWTF Kiva lending team on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: Purchase more stock to sell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ronalet

texts.en:
Ronalet J. is a single woman who lives in Bansa, Central Tabao Zone 4, Valladolid, Negros Occidental. She earns her living by operating two business ventures: selling  E-LOAD (electronic reloading service to prepaid cellular phone users) and selling firewood. 

Ronalet joined NWTF-Project Dungganon in 2007 because she wanted something better for her family. With the help of her past eight loans from NWTF-Project Dungganon, Ronalet has been incrementally lifting her family out of poverty by the sweat of her brow. Her previous loan of 17,000 PHP helped her earn a monthly profit of about $138, raising the family's standard of living.  

This time, for her 9th cycle loan, she is borrowing 25,000 PHP, which she intends to use to buy more prepaid cellular phone service E-load and more firewood to resell so that she can continue to save up for future home repairs. Ronalet J. is a Dungganon woman who is following an honorable path toward the achievement of her dreams. 

About NWTF:
In a world full of challenges, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), is making a difference in the lives of thousands of women through Project Dungganon (a Hiligaynon word that means Honorable). Through the alleviation program, NWTF is empowering these women to progress from earning less than $1 a day to achieving realities that surpass even their dreams. They have taken a life path that will ultimately make them Dungganon - a title of esteem that is bestowed to a member of a community who has earned respect through a lifetime of hard and honest work. 

Help NWTF continue its mission to help the poorest in the Philippines by clicking the link to the NWTF Kiva lending team on Kiva.org to join our team.

loans.use: Purchase more stocks to sell

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel  tiene 44 años, es casada con dos hijos menores de edad. Su actividad económica es una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación, la cual ya tiene 18 años de tenerla, esta pulpería brinda de manutención a ella y a su familia. Este negocio empezó con muy poco capital  de trabajo, como una búsqueda de fuente de ingresos alternativos. El crédito será invertido en la compra de granos básicos, que es lo que más se vende actualmente. Su meta actualmente es que sus hijos logren finalizar sus estudios y mejorar las condiciones de vida del hogar.
texts.en: Maribel is 44 years old; she is married and has two underage children. She has a general store located in her home; she has had the store for 18 years since it provides income for her and her family. She began the business with very little money and she had to find a source of alternative income. The loan will be used to buy basic grains which is what she sells. Her goal is that her children will be able to finish their studies and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: Work capital.

loans.name: Evelyn Emperatriz

texts.es:
Evelyn tiene una papelería en la parte delantera de su casa, vive en una zona urbana llamada Guasmo de Guayaquil la mayoría de habitantes son comerciantes informales. 

Hace 5 años atrás ella inicio su papelería comprando unos cuadernos pequeños y vendiendo en la temporada escolar. Desde ese tiempo ha surtido su papelería  trabajando desde las 08h00am hasta las 20h00pm todos los días. Vende papelería, cuadernos, plumas, laminas etc.  

El quiere con el préstamo comprar cuadernos y papelería. En el futuro quiere tener su negocio mas grande y surtido para asegurar la vida económica de sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Evelyn has a stationary store in the front of her home that is in an urban area called Guasmo of Guayaquil, the majority of the inhabitants are informal merchants.

Some 5 years ago, Evelyn began her stationary store by buying small notebooks and selling them during the school season. From that time she has worked in her stationary store by working from 8:00 a.m until 8 p.m. everyday. She sells stationary, notebooks, pens, covers, etc.

She needs the loan to buy notebooks and stationary. In the future she wants her business to be bigger and stocked to secure the economic future of her two children.

loans.use: To buy notebooks, papers.

loans.name: Independencia Group

texts.es: Aura Marina G. C., tiene 23 años de edad, soltera, de oficios domesticos, se dedica a la artesanía, con el fin de ampliar se capital de trabajo organiza un grupo conformado por 5 personas, señoras, las que se dedican a la artesanía elaborando canastas  y trajes típicos, son originarias de la misma zona y tienen un estrecho lazo de compañerismo. Es el segundo crédito que solicitan para ampliación de capital de trabajo igual que sus compañeras, sus referencia personales indican que son mujeres responsables y trabajadoras, en la fase de conformación del grupo anterior demostraron ser muy solidarias entre ellas, tiene grandes objetivos por lo que saben que su negocio es rentable.
texts.en: The Grupo Solidario La Independencia (Independence Solidarity Group) is composed of five women, who all engage in crafts producing traditional baskets and costumes. They come from the same area and they are united by a strong friendship. The coordinator is 23 years old and she is single. They are requesting their second loan to increase their working capital. According to their personal references, they are all responsible and hard-working women, and they demonstrated being very caring with each other during the organizing phase of their group. They will be able to comply with their monthly repayments with the help of their families.

loans.use: To increse their working capital.

loans.name: Kodzo

texts.fr: kodzo est un homme de 36 ans, il est un enseignant de profession. pour accroître ses revenu il s'est lancé dans le commerce de détail de cartes de recharges téléphoniques. il  a une ancienneté de 3 ans dans ce commerce et s'approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. Sa clientèle se compose de toutes personnes. la demande actuelle de sa clientèle est élevée. Il sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat de 2 cartons de cartes de recharges ILLICO, 5 cartons de cartes de recharge TOGOCELL et 5 cartons de recharges MOOV. Avec ce stock il compte satisfaire toutes sa clientèle. il est marié et père d'un enfant.
texts.en: Kodzo, 36, is a teacher. To increase his income, he  also sells rechargeable telephone cards. He has been doing this for three years and buys his stock at the big market in Lomé. His clientele is made up of all sorts of people. The demand from his clientele is presently higher so he is asking WAGES for a loan to buy two boxes of ILLICO brand rechargeable phone cards, five boxes of TOGOCELL, and five boxes of MOOV. With this amount  of inventory, he believes he can satisfy the needs of all his customers. He is married and the father of one child.

loans.use: purchase of a number of boxes of rechargeable phone cards

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: Nelly, de 44 años, convive con José, de 46 años, con quien tienen 4 hijos, pero solo viven con dos de ellos Diego de 18 y Ridick de 17 años, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Patay. Todas las mañanas desde hace 15 años, se despierta para atender su pequeña tienda de verduras, alimentos, frutas y panes. Nelly es muy conocida y respetada en su barrio, porqué todos los sábados y domingos se dirige a la ciudad a comprar los productos que venderá en su tienda; ella es la única que abastece el lugar con productos alimenticios, debido a la lejanía del lugar.  Con el pasar de los años, Nelly equipó su tienda con carnes, azúcar, arroz y ahora quiere adquirir más productos para poder satisfacer las necesidades de los habitantes de la ciudad y con ello obtener mayor capital para poder invertir en mejorar la infraestructura de su tienda. Es el décimo crédito con MFP y agradece el apoyo que le ofreció su banco comunal en el progreso de su tienda. Con el crédito que solicita, completará el capital faltante para comprar un carro y así poder trasportarse constantemente.
texts.en: Nelly is 44 years old and she lives with her partner, José who is 46 years old. They have 4 children, but only two live with them, Diego, 18, and Ridick, 17. They own a house in the town of Patay. For 15 years she has been waking up early every morning to run her small shop where she sells vegetables, fruit, bread and food in general. Nelly is very well known and respected in her neighborhood, as every Saturday and Sunday she goes to town to buy the products she will then sell in her shop: she is the only one supplying the area which is very far away from the town. As the years went by Nelly supplied her shop with meat, sugar, rice, and she now wants to buy more products to be able to satisfy the townspeople’s necessities and thus increase her working capital to then invest it in the infrastructure of her shop. This is her tenth loan with MFP, and she thankful to her communal bank who has supported her and the progress of her shop. The loan she is requesting will complete the amount she needs to buy a car to then be able to travel constantly.

loans.use: To reach the amount she needs to buy a car to be used for her activity.

loans.name: Ruben Dario

texts.es:
Rubén Martínez es el propietario del Kiosco el Artesano en el municipio de San Jacinto, población de Bolívar, donde vende sombreros, tambores, hamacas, mochilas y artesanías en general producidas en este municipio. Se dedicó a esta actividad, después de haber estado trabajando en un almacén de artesano, durante más de tres años; así fue como  compró un lote y  construyó su casa y un local para el almacén, que proyectó en esa época y del cual  hoy  vive muy orgulloso,  pues lo ha fortalecido poco a poco hasta llegara a organizarlo.  Rubén cuenta que aunque ha tenido épocas muy buenas y muy malas, nunca con las segundas se le ha quitado su natural entusiasmo y mas ahora en estos últimos años que las venta han mejorado. Su negocio está ubicado en la carretera troncal en un sitio donde se encuentran muchos almacenes de artesanías y está vinculado a la Fundación Mari Santo Domingo, desde hace mas de dos años;  con estos financiamientos ha logrado tener el dinero en efectivo para comprar con buenos descuentos . Su meta es tener un gran almacén con mecánicas que tengan rotación más rápida y también lograr nuevos clientes en otras regiones del país, donde reconocen las artesanías producida en su pueblo.
Su mayor desafío es sostener con salud a su esposa, que tuvo quebrantos y que requieren de todo su cariño y   cuidado, lo mismo que del de sus  3 hijos que están en las edades de 25 a 30 años. Con su credickiva comprará sobreros, juegos de tambores, mochilas, hamacas, sillas, que tiene encargadas y surtirá con muchas artesanías su local, para aprovechar las vacaciones que se presentan en el fin de año y donde llegan muchos viajeros a comprarle
texts.en:
Rubén Martínez is the proprietor of a handicrafts kiosk in the San Jacinto municipality in the town of Bolívar.  He sells hats, drums, hammocks, backpacks, and general handicrafts that are produced in this municipality.  He started this business after having worked in a handicraft store for over three years.

He bought a lot, and he built his house and a place for his store that he had planned during that time.  Now he proudly lives there.  Little by little he has built it up until he had it all arranged.  Rubén says that even though he has had very good and very bad times, he never lost his enthusiasm.  He has even more enthusiasm in these past years that his sales have improved.  His business is located on the main road in a place where there are a lot of handicraft stores.

He has been involved with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for over two years.  With the loans he has managed to have the cash to make his purchases at a good discount.  

His goal is to have a large store with mechanisms to promote greater turnover.  He also wants to have new customers in other regions of the country where they recognize the handicrafts produced in his town.

His greatest challenge is maintaining his wife’s health.  She has had health issues, and she requires all of his affection and care.  They have three children between the ages of 25 and 30.

With the loan from Kiva he will buy hats, drum sets, backpacks, hammocks, and chairs that he has orders for.  He will also stock his place with lots of handicrafts.  He will do this to takes advantage of the end of the year vacations when lots of travelers come to shop.

loans.use: To buy hats, drum sets, backpacks, hammocks, and chairs that he has orders for, and to stock his place with lots of handicrafts

loans.name: Adis Judith

texts.es:
Adis Judith nació en Larica una población del municipio de Córdoba, allí nacieron sus sueños que en un futuro trasladó a la ciudad de Cartagena, hoy con dos  hijos en las edades de 17 y 19 años  terminando el bachillerato y cursando una carrera en la universidad, se siente muy agradecida con Dios, porque como mujer cabeza de familia vivió los mas grandes desafíos en su educación, tratando de ofrecerles siempre lo mejor. Adis se inició trabajando en el sector publico de estado,  luego empezó a trabajar independiente vendiendo ropa de segunda, en el año 2004, gracias a la capacitación que le brindó la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo  ha logrado sus cuatro financiamientos   y    crecer como comerciante, pues en la actualidad ha diversificado su oferta de mercancías  y por eso  compra  la ropa en Medellín,  la cual es muy apetecidas por sus clientes y los vende en la ciudad de Cartagena, así mismo viaja a San Jacinto Bolívar, donde compra  hamacas y otras artesanías que vende en la ciudades donde se las encarguen. Con su credickiva, comprará ropa casual para damas caballeros y para niños que tiene encargado para engalanar a sus clientes en las fiestas de fin de año.

Como Adis siempre piensa en ingresos, trabaja fuertemente, así es como también  se dedica a la venta de lotería y al chance; todas estas actividades en su conjunto le han permitido mejorar su nivel de vida y  ahora su sueño  se enfoca en tener una boutique porque su principal reto como  madre cabeza de familia es ayudar a brindarles una educación de calidad  a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Adis Judith was born in Larica, a town in the municipality of Córdoba.  It was there that she dreamed of moving to the city of Cartagena in the future.  Today, she has two children ages 17 and 19. One is finishing high school and the other is studying for a university degree.  She feels very thankful to God because as the female head of the family, she endured great challenges in providing their education and was always struggling to give them the best. 
 
Initially, Adis worked in the state’s public sector; then she began selling second-hand clothing. In 2004, thanks to the training offered to her by the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, she received her fourth loan and continues to grow as a business woman. At the present time, she has diversified her supply of merchandise.  She buys her clothing in Medelin because it is very highly desired by her customers and sells it in Cartagena.  In addition, she travels to San Jacinto Bolívar, where she buys hammocks and other crafts which she sells in cities where customers have placed orders.  With her Kiva loan, she will buy casual clothing for ladies, gentlemen, and children for her customers who have ordered it to dress up for New Year’s Eve parties.

As Adis is always thinking about income, she works hard.  She also sells lottery tickets.   All of these activities together, have allowed her to improve her standard of living. Now her dream is focused on owning a boutique because her primary goal as female head of the family is to provide her children with a quality education.

loans.use: To buy ladies', gentlemen's and children's casual clothing to fill orders.

loans.name: Santos Ramona

texts.es:
Santos Ramona S. García
Santos Ramona  es de 47 años de edad, casada con tres hijos, se dedica a oficios domésticos  pero actualmente se dedica a la prestación de servicio de baños con regadera en la cual lleva 10 años de experiencia en dicha actividad, actualmente solicita su segundo  crédito para la compra de calderas, tubería para baño y de esta manera ofrecer un servicio mas adecuado para sus clientes. Las referencias personales indican que es una persona responsable  y trabajadora por lo que no tendrá inconvenientes para realizar sus pagos correspondientes.
texts.en: Santos Ramona is 47 years old.  She is married and has three children.  She is a domestic worker but presently she provides restroom and shower services.  She has 10 years of experience in this business.   She is requesting her second loan to purchase water heaters and bathroom water pipes in order to upgrade service to her customers.  Her personal references indicate that she is a hard-working, responsible perS. who will not have problems making her payments.

loans.use: To buy bathroom water pipes and water heaters

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es: José Francisco tiene 35 años. El señor se dedica a brindar los servicios de carpintería. El dio inicio a este negocio desde hace 10 años, el empezó trabajando en un taller en donde aprendió este oficio y lo convirtió en su medio de vida. Este crédito será invertido en la compra de madera para su negocio. El realiza diferentes productos como sillas, mesas, comedores, puertas entre otras cosas, en donde sus clientes le solicitan diferentes estilos de productos. El sueña siempre tener muchos clientes y además mejorar las condiciones de su familia.
texts.en: José Francisco is 35 years old.  He has been a carpenter for 10 years.  He began working in a workshop where he learned this trade and made it his livelihood.  He will use this loan to buy wood for his business.  He makes various products such as chairs, tables, dinette sets, and doors as well as other things in different styles according to the requests of his customers.  He always dreams of having more customers as well as improving the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Germaine Maye

texts.fr:
Germaine Mayé Y. est une femme de 77 ans. Elle est veuve et mère neuf enfants dont la majeur partie est adulte. Elle est membre fondateur du Banc Villageois de BABACK depuis 1997. Elle a 26 fois de suite reçu de crédit et a été toujours exemplaire dans ses remboursements. 

Elle fait un petit commerce de divers produits qu'elle achète au marché de Thiès pour revendre dans son village. Elle vend des produits halieutiques et des légumes.

Avec son prêt elle va augmenter son niveau d'approvisionnement en marchandises afin de réaliser plus de ressources financières.

Son objectif est de subvenir à ses besoins personnels et de prendre en charge sa santé.
texts.en:
Germaine Mayé Y. is 77 years old. She is a widow and a mother of 9 mostly adult children. She founded the Baback Village Bank in 1997. She has had 26 loans and has always made her repayments on time.
She runs a small business selling various products in her village that she buys at the market in Thiès. She sells seafood and vegetables.
With this loan she will expand her stock of merchandise in order to increase her financial resources.
Her goal is to be able to meet her personal needs and to look after her health.

loans.use: To expand her stock

loans.name: Mirko

texts.es: El Sr. Mirko se dedica al servicio de taxi desde hace dos años, comenzó muy joven debido a que tuvo su hijo y se dedico a trabajar para mantener a su familia, con la ayuda de su madre compro un auto y con este trabaja como taxista, lastimosamente se arruino el motor del vehículo el cual tiene que cambiarlo, Mirko indica que no fallara en el pago de sus cuotas y esta agradecido con la institución por el crédito otorgado, el cual le permitirá trabajar con regularidad y así poder sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en: Mirko has been a taxi driver for two years.  He started very young because he had a son and needed to work to support his family.  With the help of his mother, he bought a car which he uses to operate his taxi service.  Unfortunately, the vehicle’s motor was ruined and he had to replace it.  Mirko says that he will not miss his payments. He is grateful to the institution for granting the loan which will allow him to work regularly and enable his family to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy a motor for his car.

loans.name: Karina Katiuska

texts.es:
Karina es vendedora de productos para el hogar como electrodomésticos, accesorios y un poco de papelería. Vive en el suburbio de Guayaquil zona caracterizada porque sus habitantes son comerciantes informales. 

Para ayudar con los gastos familiares ya que su esposo era el único que trabaja ella tubo que comenzar a buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos, comenzó por vender ollas, platos plásticos, etc.   Poco a poco a tenido ingresos para solventar los gastos. Vende electrodomésticos, papelería a crédito para las personas que no pueden pagar la contado. 

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar sabanas, edredones, ollas arroceras para así tener mas oportunidades de venta. En el futuro quiere tener un almacén de electrodomésticos.
texts.en:
Karina sells household products such as electrical appliances, accessories, and some stationery.  She lives in the suburb of Guayaquil, a region characterized by inhabitants who are informal traders.    

Since her husband was the only one working, she had to begin looking for a business that would generate income to help with the family expenses
She began by selling “ollas: (rounded earthenware pots or jars, used especially for cooking or for carrying water), plastic plates, etc.  Little by little she has earned income to pay the expenses.  She sells electric appliances and stationery on credit for people who cannot pay cash.

In order to continue her business, she wants to buy sheets, comforters, “ollas” and rice cookers so she will have more opportunities for sales.  In the future, she wants to own an electrical appliance store.

loans.use: Electrical appliances, sheets, comforters.

loans.name: Giovanni Felix

texts.es: Don Giovanni es de 26 años de edad, casado,  es carpintero y estudiante, actualmente trabaja en una entidad financiera tiene más de 2 años de experiencia en dicha entidad, el crédito lo utilizara para compra de terreno, ha tenido créditos anteriores y ha sido puntual en sus pagos, ha demostrado que es una persona responsable, la labor que realiza le genera un ingreso para sostener a su familia y cubrir sus pagos. Espera un aumento salarial para tener una mejor condición de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Giovanni Félix Vásquez Méndez
Giovanni is 26 years old, married, and is both a carpenter and a student.  He is currently the head of a financial institution called Banrural and has more than 2 years of experience.  He is asking for his third loan, which he will use to purchase some land or assets.  Based on the loans that he had before, Giovanni has demonstrated that he is a responsible and hard working person who will be able to make his payments.

loans.use: Purchasing some land

loans.name: Constancio

texts.es: El señor Constancio  tiene un taller de muelleria y trabaja hace mucho tiempo en esta actividad, con mucho esfuerzo logro equipar su taller y ahora es uno de los mas requeridos por los choferes de la zona El Tejar. El señor vive en alquiler y su deseo es tener su propia vivienda por eso trabaja desde la mañana hasta la noche para poder ahorrar dinero. El señor se esfuerza al máximo para tener un mejor futuro cuando logre formar una familia. Don Constancio aprendió esta actividad trabajando primero como ayudante desde muy niño. Con la institución comenzó a trabajar en el grupo solidario Unión La Portada por motivo de viaje se independizo para sacar un credito individual y esta séptima renovación con cero días de atraso con los años se nota el progreso puesto que esta a punto de comprarse una movilidad para tener mas ingresos, con el dinero del credito comprara paquetes de muelles por cantidad y variedad, esta muy agradecido con la institucion por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Constancio has an auto repair shop and has made a living from this activity for a long time.  Through his hard work he has managed to equip his shop, which is now one of the most popular shops among drivers in the El Tejar neighborhood.  Constancio lives in a rented apartment, but wants to have his own house—that is why he works from morning until night so that he can save money.  He puts in his maximum effort in order to have a better future, which will include starting a family.  Constancio first learned his trade while working as an assistant when he was very young.  He began working with the Unión La Portada solidarity group and the Emprender organization because he could take out an individual loan, and this is the seventh loan cycle in which he has not fallen behind in his payments; over time he has made sufficient progress so that he can now purchase a vehicle in order to increase his income.  He will use the money from the loan to purchase packages of various springs in bulk.  Constancio is very grateful to the organization for the help it has provided.

loans.use: Purchasing packages of springs and supplies

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: Doña María es de 29 años de edad, Casada, tiene tres hijas, se dedica a la actividad de costurera/sastre, en la actividad tiene más de 2 años de experiencia y ve bien con este trabajo, ya que devenga de este los gastos familiares y otros gastos, solicita su segundo crédito  para  la compra de terreno que le sirve para el bienestar de su familia, ya que su sueño es que sus hijas tengan un lugar donde vivir cuando sean grandes, los creditos anteriores los pago sin problemas de atrasos y de acuerdo a la actividad a la que se dedica podrá realizar sus pagos en el credito actual. De esta manera ella contribuye al desarrollo de su familia y la sociedad.
texts.en:
María Guadalupe Y. T. 
María is 29 years old, married, and has three daughters.  She makes a living as a seamstress/tailor, and already has more than two years of experience in this trade.  She is now requesting her second loan so that she can purchase land, which will be a worthwhile investment.  Through her work she will be able to make her payments without any problems.

loans.use: Purchasing some land or assets

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Gloria se dedica a la elaboración de mochilas, tiene mucho tiempo con este negocio desde hace 7 años, por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues han sido de gran ayuda con su negocio. Por lo que siempre está buscando la forma de sufragar los gastos de su hogar,  ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y que ha salido adelante con todas las dificultades que ha enfrentado. Este crédito que solicita es para la compra de zipper, hilos, tirantes, tijera entre otras cosas necesarias. Pues siempre está esforzándose para lograr mucho empeño en su actividad.
texts.en: Gloria works making backpacks and has been in the business for seven years, which is why this isn’t the first time that she has received a loan.  The loans have been of great help to her business, which is why she is always looking for a way to defray her household expenses.  She is a very enterprising woman and she has gotten ahead, even with all of the difficulties that she has faced.  The loan that she is requesting is for the purchase of zippers, thread, straps, scissors, and other necessary items.  She always puts a lot of effort into her work to do her best.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia, de 38 años, es una mujer luchadora y alegre, es madre soltera y a pesar de los constantes problemas que afronta está orgullosa de su hija María de 14 años; ambas viven en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Patay. Desde muy temprano se levanta para poder preparar sus alimentos y enviar a estudiar a su hija, y a las 8 de la mañana se dirige a cuidar y limpiar sus sembríos hasta altas horas de la noche, como dice: “hasta que el cuerpo resista “. Ya que son 28 años que ella se dedica a la siembra de papa (tubérculo peruano), arveja y flores de gladiolos. Como toda una mujer de negocios Sonia también abrió una pequeña tienda, donde vende productos de primera necesidad.  Más delante desea incrementar sus ventas; con la compra de más semillas y sembrar en mayores cantidades; para poder venderlo a un mejor precio y darle una excelente calidad de vida a su hija, que es el motor de su progreso y trabajo. Es el octavo crédito con MFP y está sumamente agradecida por la seguridad que le brinda su banco comunal. Con el crédito que solicita,  lo invertirá en la compra de semillas de gladiolos, ya que es la temporada donde hay mayor demanda, asimismo desea surtir su pequeño negocio con la compra de productos novedosos.
texts.en: Sonia is a happy and resourceful woman of 38 years of age. She is a single mother and even with the constant problems she has to face she is proud of her 14 year –old daughter María. They both live in a house they own located in the town of Patay. She gets up very early to prepare her meals and to send her daughter tor school; at 8 in the morning she goes tacking care of her sown fields until very late at night or, as she herself says “until the body resists”. She has been engaging in planting potatoes (Peruvian tuber), peas and gladioli for 28 years. Being a real businesswoman, Sonia has also opened a small shop were she sell basic necessities. In the future she wishes to increase her sales by buying more seeds and cropping more products, in order to sell them at a better price and give an excellent quality of life to her daughter, the real engine behind her progress and her work. This is her eight loan with MFP, and she is extremely thankful to the security offered by her communal bank. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy gladiolus seeds, as this is the season with the highest demand; she also wants to supply her small ship by buying new products.

loans.use: To buy gladiolus seeds.

loans.name: Nahim Dante

texts.es: El señor Nahim tiene como principal actividad económica la venta de ajuares y ropa de bebe, los ajuares los elabora el mismo en su taller que queda en la ciudad de Viacha, el mismo vende sus productos en la Huyustus y en la Tumusla  ( zonas comerciales de la ciudad de La Paz )don Nahim vive junto a su madre y a su pequeño hermano, este negocio lo aprendió de su padre, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de tela polar y en ropa de bebé, en un futuro el piensa en hacer crecer su negocio y a corto plazo tener una verdadera fábrica de costura. Por el momento el quiere comercializar su producto en el mercado chileno gracias a un contacto que tiene en este país.Don Nahim sueña con dar a su hermnito y a su mama un futuro mejor y estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Nahim sells trousseaux and baby clothes.  He makes the trousseaux himself in his workshop in the city of Viacha, and he sells his products in la Huyustus and la Tumusla, which are commercial areas of La Paz.  Nahim lives with his mother and his little brother.  He learned this trade from his father.  

He will invest the loan in buying fleece and baby clothes.  In the future, he hopes to increase his business and have an actual sewing factory.  He wants to sell his product in the Chilean market through a contact he has there.  Nahim hopes to give his baby brother and his mother a better future and more economic stability.

loans.use: To buy fleece and baby clothes

loans.name: Jose Norlando

texts.es: El señor José Norlando, desde hace mas de dos años instalo en su casa de habitación una pulpería, que es atendía personalmente por él y su esposa, este negocio lo instalo como una fuente de empleo y de ingresos para la familia. Tiene un horario de atención de lunes a viernes de 6 de la mañana a 7 de la noche, vende granos básicos, refrescos naturales y artificiales, cosméticos, golosinas, ropa para niños y otros productos. Con este financiamiento aumentara el inventario de sus productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes y de esa manera aumentar sus ganancias. El sueña con lograr convertir su pulpería en una distribuidora.
texts.en:
For many years, José Norlando has had a general store in his home, which he and his wife run.  The business was started to provide employment and income for his family.  It is open from Monday to Friday from 6 am to 7 pm.  It sells staples, juices and soft drinks, cosmetics, sweets, children's clothes, and other products.  

He will invest this loan in products for his clients so as to increase his income.  He wants to convert his store into a local distributor one day.

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchasing wood

loans.name: Jesus Nelson

texts.es: El señor Jesus vive en la zona del barrio Internacional, en la zona del Plan 3000, él hace 10 años que se dedica al servicio del transporte urbano, empezó como chofer trabajando para otras personas  y actualmente esta pagando su propio vehiculo, él necesita el crédito para terminar de construir en su casa un cuarto que tiene a medio construir y tambien quiere hacer algunos arreglos al motor de su vehiculo, ya que como es su herramienta de trabajo necesita que este en optimas condiciones porque el trabaja desde las 06:00 de la mañana hasta las 23:00 para poder cumplir con las obligaciones y responsabilidades que tiene, el junto a su familia quieren mejorar sus ingresos por lo que sueñan con comprar muy pronto otro vehiculo para poder generar más ingresos. El señor Nelson se caracteriza por ser una persona muy responsable y cumplido.
texts.en:
Señor Jesus lives in the International neighborhood, in the region of Plan 3000.  For the past 10 years he has been running an urban transport service.  He started as a driver working for other people and now he owns his own vehicle.  

He needs a loan to finish the construction on his house as he has a room that is half-built.  He also wants to make some repairs to his vehicle since he is dependent on it for work.  He needs his vehicle to be in optimal working condition because he works from 6:00 in the morning until 11:00 at night in order to meet his obligations and responsibilities.  He and his family would like to buy another vehicle very soon so that they can generate more income.  

Señor Nelson is known for being a very responsible and accomplished person.

loans.use: To finish construction on his house and make repairs to his car

loans.name: Elba Rosa Ana

texts.es:
La Sra. Elba Rosa Ana V. L. de 47 años de edad vive junto a su esposo e hijo. Tiene casa propia, la cual se encuentra ubicada en el caserio aguada de palos perteneciente al distrito de Santiago. La Sra. Elba
se dedica hace 5 años a la venta de ropa. Su esposo se dedica a la venta y reparación de bicicletas y motos.
La Sra. Elba requiere el crédito para capital de trabajo. Su sueño segun nos comenta es tener un negocio estable para poder darle una buena educación a su hijo. La Sra. Elba está muy agradecida por el apoyo que le podamos brindar a tráves de este financiamiento.
texts.en:
Señora Elba Rosa Ana V. L. is 47 years old and lives with her husband and son.  She owns her own house which is located in the village Aguada de Palos in the Santiago district.  Señora Elba has been selling clothing for 5 years.  Her husband repairs and sells bicycles and motorbikes. Señora Elba is requesting a loan  to increase her working capital.  

She tells us that her dream is to have a stable business so that she is able to give her son a good education.  Señora Elba is very grateful for the support we are able to offer her through this loan.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Hector Otoniel

texts.es:
Héctor Otoniel A.
Héctor es de 65 años de edad, casado, tiene tres hijos varones y una mujer, es oficinista, actualmente es Tramitador de Empelados Municipales, en la actividad lleva ocho años de experiencia, solicita su cuarto crédito para remodelación de su vivienda y la mejora del mismo como el bienestar de su familia en general, los préstamos anteriores los pago sin problemas de atraso.
texts.en:
Héctor Otoniel A.
Héctor is 65 years old, married (his wife works at an office), and has three sons.  Héctor currently works as the Clerk for Municipal Employees, and has eight years of experience in that job.  He is requesting his fourth loan so that he can remodel his home and thus improve his family’s general welfare.  Héctor paid back his previous loans without ever falling behind in his payments.

loans.use: Remodeling his home

loans.name: Mario Jose

texts.es: El señor Mario se dedica al transporte de material de construcción. Con vehículo propio, es una volqueta de doce cubos, hace de dos a tres viajes por día, desde hace dos años se dedica a esta actividad, es un cliente que ya trabajo con la institución ,  el señor vive en casa familiar, en la casa  de sus padres, tiene tres hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar y su esposa es la que se encarga del cuidado de sus hijos y de los suegros, que también viven con ellos, el dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar material de construcción como ser cemento, calaminas, clavos, etc. Para la refacción de 2 ambientes en la casa de sus papas, para así poder brindar mayor comodidad a sus hijos.
texts.en: Mario makes a living transporting construction materials.  He has his own vehicle, a twelve-wheeler dump truck, and makes two to three trips each day.  He has made a living this way for two years.  Mario has already worked with the Emprender organization.  He lives in his parents’ house along with his three school-age children and his wife, who takes care of the children and her in-laws.  Mario will use the money from the loan to purchase construction materials such as cement, corrugated metal, nails, etc.  These materials are for renovating two rooms in his parents’ home, and will allow him to provide more space for his children.

loans.use: Purchasing construction materials for renovating his home

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina, de 54 años, esta casada con Gabriel de 59 años, producto de su amor nació Tania de 37 años; ellos viven solos en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Patay. Su día la pasa cuidando su terreno de cultivo; hace ya 16 años que viene sembrando olluco, papa, arveja y maíz, el cual los vende en el mercado central de su ciudad. Pero no solo a la agricultura se dedica Marina, ella también prepara comida los fines de semana en sus casa; donde instaló un pequeño restaurante desde hace 10 años; los habitantes de sus localidad, ya la conocen por su buen gusto en la cocina y no hay quien no coma sus deliciosos platos un día sábado o domingo. Ahora ella quiere tener más capital y poder dedicarse absolutamente a su negocio de comida y expandirse más. Es el segundo crédito con MFP y está S. que su banco comunal la apoyará en el logro de su objetivo. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará semillas de arvejas y abono, ya que es la temporada donde hay mayor demanda.
texts.en:
Marina, 54 years old, is married to Gabriel, 59, and a product of their love was Tania who is 37.  They live by themselves in her own house in the locale of Patay.  Marina passes her day caring for her cultivated land.  For 16 years now she has been sowing 'olluco' (an ancient Andean tuber), potatoes, vetch (peas), and corn, which she sells in her city's central market.

But Marina isn't just involved in agriculture.  She also prepares meals on weekends in her house, where  some 10 years ago she installed a small restaurant.  She is known by residents of her locality for the good flavors of her kitchen and there is no one who fails to savor her delicious dishes on a Saturday or a Sunday.

Now Marina wants to have more capital to be able to dedicate herself absolutely to her meals business and expand it more.  This is her 2nd loan with MFP and she is certain that her communal bank will help her in achieving her objective.

With the loan Marina is requesting, she will buy vetch seeds and manure, now that it is the season of the greatest demand.

loans.use: BUYING VETCH (PEA) SEEDS AND SACKS OF MANURE FOR HER CROP

loans.name: Julio Andres

texts.es:
Julio Andrés Z. S.
Julio es de 33 años de edad, casado, tiene dos hijos varones, es tejedor, actualmente elabora cortes típicos, en la actividad tiene ocho años de experiencia, solicita su primer crédito para ampliación de capital de trabajo y compra de material para tejeduría, el solicitante ha llenado los requisitos, la cual es factible la autorización del mismo.
texts.en:
Julio Andrés Z. S.
Julio is 33 years old, married and has 2 sons. He is a weaver and currently works in traditional pieces. He has 8 years of experience with this work. He is requesting his first loan for expanding his capital for work and to buy material for weaving. He has met the requirements for the loan, which was possible with his own authorization.

loans.use: To buy materials for weaving

loans.name: Patricia Ramona

texts.es: Patricia Ramona tiene 33 años, su actividad es un cyber además vende leña, bananos entre otras cosas. Este negocio inicio hace más de 20 años, con el esfuerzo y sacrificio ha logrado avanzar poco a poco con su negocio, los clientes que mas asisten a su negocio son estudiantes también brinda el servicio de llamada nacionales e internacionales, levantado de texto y video juegos. Con iniciativa propia es que comenzó este negocio pues para ella es muy importante generar ingresos para su hogar. Este financiamiento es para la compra de computadoras, papel, tinta entre otras cosas necesarias.
texts.en: Patricia Ramona is 33 years old, she has an internet cafe and also sells firewood and bananas among other things. She has done this for more than 20 years, and with effort and sacrifice she has managed to make progress little by little in her business. Her most regular customers are students, she also offers a national and international calling service, digitizing documents and video games. She started this business on her own initiative as it is very important for her to generate an income for her household. This financing is to purchase computers, paper, and ink among other necessary things.

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Santos Manuel

texts.es:
Santos Manuel A. A.
Santos es de 24 años de edad, casado, tiene un hijo varón y una mujer, es comerciante, actualmente es ayudante de albañil, en el servicio tiene dos años de experiencia, solicita su primer crédito para compra de lamina para su vivienda, se ha evaluado la capacidad del solicitante y la utilidad del crédito, la cual es factible la autorización del mismo.
texts.en: Santos is 24 years old, married and has a son and a daughter.  He is a merchant.  He is currently a construction worker, in which  he has two years of experience.  He is requesting his first loan to be able to purchase metal sheeting for his home.  The financial standing of the solicitor has been evaluated and also the usefulness of the loan.  It is feasible to authorize this loan.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials

loans.name: Mayela

texts.es: Mayela, de 36 años, vive con Julio, de 43 años, ambos tienen 3 hijos pero solo viven con 2 de ellos, Miguel de 12 y Selina de 5 años, en su casa propia en el pueblo de Patay. Todas las mañanas se levanta muy temprano, para preparar los alimentos que consumirán durante el día; la mayor parte de su tiempo lo dedica a la siembra de papa, arveja y flores. Con la ayuda de su esposo Julio, aplica abono y limpia sus plantaciones, Mayela tiene que estar muy atenta a los cambios climáticos que impiden su crecimiento, “La mejor cura son las medicinas”, menciona. Cuando su siembra está lista, junto a su esposo selecciona los frutos y luego viajan al mercado central de su ciudad para venderlos en grandes cantidades, ya son 8 años que se dedican a esta actividad y son muy conocidos en su localidad, más adelante quieren comprar más terrenos para poder cultivar mayor cantidad de verduras y obtener mayores ganancias. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP y está contenta con su banco comunal, agradece el apoyo y orientación que le brindan. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará tres bolsas de semillas de arveja, que cuestan quinientos soles cada uno; el cual los utilizará en la siembra de los próximos meses.
texts.en: Mayela is 36 years old, she lives with Julio who is 43, and they have 3 children, but only two live with them, Miguel, aged 12, and Selina, aged 5. They own a house in the town of Patay. She gets up very early every morning to prepare their meals for the day; the majority of her time is dedicated to planting potatoes, peas and flowers. With the help of her husband Julio, she gives manure and cleans her crops. Mayela need to pay high attention to climate changes that could hamper their growth, and she says that “medicines are the best treatment”. When her crops are ready, together with her husband she selects the products and then they travel to the central market of their town to sell them in great quantities. They have been engaging in this activity for 8 years already, and they are very well known in their area; in the future they would like to buy more land, in order to crop more vegetables and to increase their earnings. This is her fourth loan with MFP: she is happy with her communal bank, and she is thankful for the support they give her. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy three bags of pea seeds: they each cost five hundred soles and she will plant them in the next few months.

loans.use: To buy three bags of pea seeds.

loans.name: Basilio Antonio

texts.es:
Basilio Antonio López Velásquez
Basilio es de 58 años de edad, casada, es comerciante se dedica a la actividad de tejeduría, en la actividad tiene nueve años de experiencia, solicita su primer crédito para ampliación de capital de tejeduría. Sus referencias personales indican que es una persona responsable y trabajadora, por tal motivo no tendrá inconvenientes para pagar el préstamo.
texts.en:
Basilio Antonio López Velásquez
Basilio is 58 years old, married and is a merchant working in textile weaving.  He has nine years of experience in this activity.  He is requesting his first loan to increase his working capital.  His personal references indicate that he is a responsible and hard working person and therefore will not have any problems repaying the loan.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Urkupiña Group

texts.es:
Es grupo de personas muy trabajadoras viven en la zona de Villa Obrajes , la presidenta es la Sra. María se dedican a la venta de edredones y ropa lleva en esta actividad varis años, le va muy bien ya que tiene mucha clientela y le hicieron varios pedidos, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería al por mayor como ser ropa de temporada de calor ya que estamos en primavera, esta muy agradecida con la institución por la oportunidad que le brinda. 
la Sras. Ayda y  Gloria   madres jóvenes se dedican a la venta de ropa  para niños y bebes en la zona de san Antonio  los dias de feria madrugan para rescatar mercadería  y poder vender en el transcurso  de la semana el préstamo será destinado al aumento de capital ya que con eso podrán obtener mas ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida de sus familias ese su mayor deseo de ellas.
texts.en:
This group of very hard working persons lives in the Villa Obrajes area.  The president is Mrs Maria, who makes a living selling quilts and clothing.  She has been in this activity for various years.  She is doing very well since she has many customers and has gotten various orders.  With the proceeds of the loan she will buy merchandise at wholesale, such as clothing for the upcoming hot season since it is spring here.  She is very grateful to the foundation for the opportunity that it gives her.
The ladies  Ayda and  Gloria are young mothers and make a living selling clothing for children and infants in the San Antonio area.  On market days they get merchandise very early and thus have it to sell during the week.  The loan will be for the increase in working capital which will allow them to make more income. Improving the quality of life of their families is their biggest dream.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Tierra Fertil (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Tierra Fértil está formado por 12 socios entre hombres y mujeres, quienes son amigos, vecinos y han llegado a tener una muy buena amistad, trabajan en distintas actividades pero tienen un fin común que es  superarse en sus negocios y así ir  mejorando económicamente para entregarles a sus hijos y familia un mejor futuro. Viven en la comunidad de Tierra Fértil que es pertenece a la parroquia del Valle, donde la mayor parte de su población se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, también han salido a la ciudad  donde trabajan en varias actividades.

La Señora María C. vive en la comunidad de Tierra Fértil que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle, este es el cuarto ciclo que realiza los créditos en la fundación y le han beneficiado en su negocio. Se dedica a la cría de ganado,  la leche que obtiene la vende y también es para su consumo. Hace 5 años también trabaja medio día de lunes a viernes en el arreglo de una casa. Nuestra socia tiene de 58 años, es soltera y vive con su mamá, con una hermana y su sobrina. Vive en su casa que es propia. En la banca comunal tiene una gran amistad con todas las socias y socios ya que son muy alegres.
  
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de mas ganado, su meta es crecer en este negocio.

La Señora María C. vive en la comunidad de Tierra Fértil que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle, tiene 40 años,  vive en unión conyugal y ha concebido 2 hijos de 13 y 12 años de edad que estudian en un colegio de la ciudad de Cuenca. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora en una camioneta de alquiler, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia. 
La Señora María se dedica a la venta de ropa, actividad que la realiza hace 3 años, vende a sus amigas, vecinos y familiares quienes llegan a su casa a comprar su mercadería. En su hogar se dedica a la cría de animales como cerdos, cuyes y pollos, también trabaja en una fabrica de ropa en donde sus turnos son rotativos y labora de lunes a viernes, en esta labor trabaja hace 12 años. Es nuestra socia hace 4 ciclos beneficiándose en su negocio ya que con su nuevo crédito va a comprar ropa para tener más variedad para sus clientes.

Su meta es  terminar su casa.
texts.en:
The community bank Tierra Fértil (Fertile Land) is formed by 12 members, both men and women, who are friends and neighbors and have come to have a very good friendship. They work at different business activities, but they have a common goal, which is to aim ever higher in their businesses and thus continue improving their lives economically in order to give their children and their families a better future. They live in the community of Tierra Fértil, which belongs to the parish of Valle, where the majority of the people work in agriculture and raising animals, and some people have also left for the city, where they work at various activities.

Señora María C. lives in the community of Tierra Fértil, which is part of the Valle parish. This is her fourth loan cycle with the foundation, and the loans have helped her in her business. She raises livestock. She sells the milk that she obtains and it is also for her consumption. For five years she has also worked half a day from Monday to Friday doing housework. This community bank member is 58 years old. She is single and lives with her mother, a sister, and her niece. She lives in her own house. In the community bank she has a great friendship with all the members, since they are all very happy. She will invest her new loan in the purchase of more animals. Her goal is to increase her business.

Señora María C.  also lives in the community of Tierra Fértil  in the Valle parish. She is 40 years old. She lives in a common law marriage and has two children, who are 13 and 12 years old and are in school in the city of Cuenca. Her husband is a professional driver and works in a rented van. With their work, they have succeeded in constructing their own house. Señora María works in the sale of clothing, a business she has had for 3 years. She sells to her friends, neighbors, and family members who come to her house to buy her merchandise.  At home, she raises animals such as pigs, guinea pigs, and chickens. She also works from Monday to Friday in a clothing factory where her shifts rotate; she has been doing this work for 12 years. Her business has benefited from four loan cycles, and with her new loan she is going to buy clothing to have a greater variety to show her customers. Her goal is to finish building her house.

loans.use: Buy livestock; buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Myrian Cecilia

texts.es:
Myrian es vendedora de productos Yambal (empresa de cosméticos que vende productos a un bajo costo para mujeres emprendedoras), vive en el suburbio de Guayaquil.

Para ayudar con los gastos familiares ya que su esposo era el único que trabaja ella tubo que comenzar a buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos, escucho de Yambal y se inscribió como vendedora a domicilio por catalogo. Poco a poco a tenido ingresos para solventar los gastos. Vende perfumes, cremas, desodorantes etc. 

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar perfumes, cremas y desodorantes. En el futuro quiere segir con su negocio y que se expanda.
texts.en:
Myrian sells Yambal products (a cosmetics business that sells products at low cost to enterprising women) and she lives in a suburb of Guayaquil.

To help with the family expenses since her husband was the only one working, she had to start looking for a way to generate income.  She heard about Yambal and she signed up to be a saleswoman to homes through catalogs.  Little by little she has had earnings to cover her costs.  She sells perfumes, creams, deodorants, etc.

To continue with her business she wants to buy perfumes, creams and deodorants.  In the future she would like to keep at her business and have it grow.

loans.use: Perfumes, creams, clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For the purchase of inventory items (milk, plantains, soft drinks).

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es: El señor Nelson tiene 29 años. Posee su negocio que es la venta de artesanía los cuales sale a vender a los diferentes departamentos, este negocio lo inicio por sus padres quienes le enseñaron este medio de vida que para él es muy importante. El desafío que enfrenta actualmente es trasladar sus diferentes productos a los buses pues todos los días los carga para mostrarlo, pero siempre está buscando la forma de salir adelante. Este crédito que solicita es para la compra de materia prima que necesita para la elaboración de sus diferentes artesanías. Su sueño consiste en realizar la compra de un medio de transporte que le permita distribuir sus diferentes productos.
texts.en: Nelson is 29 years old. He has a business selling artisan crafts, which he goes out to sell in different departments. He started this business because of his parents who taught him this way of life, which for him is very important. The challenge that he faces right now is transporting his different products to the buses since everyday he loads them to show them. He is always looking for a way to get ahead. He has asked for this loan to buy raw materials that he needs to make his different artisan crafts. His dream is to purchase a means of transportation which will allow him to distribute his different products.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Antonieta Maricela

texts.es:
Antonieta Maricela Z. S.
Antonieta es de 23 años de edad, casada, es tejedora en la actividad tiene 8 años de experiencia, solicita su primer crédito, para gastos personales de servicios, es factible autorizar a la solicitante, en virtud que la misma es utilizada para capital de trabajo. Así mismo los pagos provienen de remesas familiares. Por lo que no tendrá dificultades para efectuar los pagos correspondientes.
texts.en:
Antonieta Maricela Z. S.
Antonieta is 23 years old and married. She is a weaver. She has 8 years of experience in this activity. She is asking for her first loan for personal expenses for utilities. It is feasible to authorize the applicant, because it will be used for working capital.  The payments will come from family remittances.   Because of this, she won't have any problems making the corresponding payments.

loans.use: Personal expenses

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: La Sra. Diana es una muchacha joven que se dedica al comercio de zapatos, pero adicionalmente  trabaja como mesera de jueves a sábado en una discoteca para poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y su bebe quien apenas tiene 3 meses, es madre soltera pero se da modos para poder seguir estudiando ya que solo le falta un año para `poder terminar la universidad con este negocio se costea los gastos de estudios. Los fines de semana por el día trabaja limpiando y cocinando en el domicilio de su garante quien la conoce desde que ella era pequeña. Este crédito necesita para poder ampliar su mercadería ya que tiene bastante pedido pero no el capital suficiente para poder cubrir la gran demanda que tiene.
texts.en: Diana is a very young woman who works in the shoe business. She also works as a waitress from Thursday through Saturday in a disco in order to improve her and her three month old baby's living conditions. She is a single mother, but she finds a way to keep going to school since she only has one more year until she can finish college. She pays for her schooling with this business. On weekends, she works during the day cooking and cleaning in her co-signer's house, who has known her since she was little. She needs this loan to be able to increase her merchandise, since she has a lot of orders but not enough capital to be able to cover the high demand that she has.

loans.use: To purchase shoes via catalog

loans.name: Maura Katalina

texts.es: La señora Maura Katalina C. O., tiene la edad de 58 años es casada, y su esposo es agricultor, son una familia de 5 hijos mayores de edad, casados y habitan en sus casas particulares con sus familias, y apoyan económicamente a sus padres, ella es agricultora con más de 16 años de experiencia, fue con el apoyo económico de su pareja que logro adquirir un terreno para comenzar a sembrar hortalizas, con el tiempo se han enfrentado a diferentes enfermedades y plagas que disminuyen la productividad de las cosechas, que afectan a  la economía del hogar, es por eta razón que solicita un préstamo ara la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas, abono e insumos vegetativos que brinden un optimo mantenimiento a sus tierras, un aumento en las ventas y la mejora continua de sus niveles de vida, la tranquilidad a sus hijos que sus padres evolucionan en sus negocios y la posibilidad de incursionar en nuevos mercados.
texts.en: Maura Katalina C. O. is 58 years old and married.  Her husband is a farmer and they have five children who are older, married, and have houses with their families.  Their children financially support them.  She has been a farmer and has more than 16 years of experience.  It was with the financial support of her husband that she was able to acquire a piece of land to begin planting vegetables.  Over time, she has faced different diseases and pests that diminish the productivity of the crops and affect her household economy.  This is why she is requesting a loan for the purchase of fertilizers, fungicides, manure and other products to provide her lands with good maintenance.  This will increase her sales and continuously improve their qualities of life, providing their children with tranquility that their parents are progressing in their businesses and the possibility that they can enter new markets.

loans.use: To provide maintenance to her farming lands.

loans.name: Eddy Pantaleon

texts.es: Eddy tiene 44 años su actividad es venta de cerdos, esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, el es un hombre muy tranquilo y la mayoría de sus clientes conocen muy bien su negocio, el se siente muy contento pues les brinda un excelente servicio. Inicio hace más de 11 años con ciertas dificultades como es la falta de transporte para trasladar los cerdos hasta su hogar, por lo que él tiene que buscarlo anticipadamente. Este financiamiento es para la compra de cerdos por lo que tiene una buena demanda de parte de sus clientes.
texts.en: Eddy is 44 years old and his activity is selling pigs. This is not the first time that he has taken out a loan. He is a very calm man and most of his customers know his business very well. He is very content because he gives them excellent service. He started more than 11 years ago with certain difficulties such as the lack of transportation to move the pigs to his house. Because of this, he has to arrange it ahead of time. This loan is to buy pigs since he has good demand from his customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Freddy  Eduardo

texts.es:
Freddy Eduardo C. Hernández
Freddy  es de 29 años de edad, soltero, perito en mercadeo con orientación en computación, se dedica desde hace  2 años y en la actividad profesional en un colegio,   solicita su segundo crédito, para la compra de materiales de vivienda, y se determina que es una inversión rentable, según su actividad la persona solicitante se  beneficiara y en la cual podrá pagar realizar sus pagos correspondientes.
texts.en:
Freddy Eduardo C. Hernández
Freddy is 29 years old, single, expert in marketing with a focus in computers.  He has been doing this for 2 years for as a career.  He is requesting a second loan for household articles, and he has determined that it is a worthwhile investment, since he will benefit from it, and thus be able to make his payments.

loans.use: Purchase household articles

loans.name: Ruth Maria

texts.es:
Ruth María B. P., vive en el barrio San Roque de la ciudad de Barranquilla, a su edad de 71 años de edad  y con dos hijos en las edades e 30 y 33 años, lo que mas le gusta en la vida es la costura; por eso creó un negocio de elaboración de prendas de vestir, desde hace mas de 25 años que le ayudó a  responder a  la necesidad de sacar adelante a su familia, porque después de la separación de su esposo esta era su mayor preocupación. Como en esa época no contaba con los recursos económicos apropiados, gradualmente elaboraba prendas de vestir y sus clientes traían la tela y los insumos y adornos, porque confeccionaba sobre medidas. Poco a poco con el fortalecimiento de este, llegó entonces a ofrecer el vestido ya elaborado, pero siempre teniendo en cuenta las medidas de cada uno. Así su negocio se convirtió en el medio de educar a sus hijos y brindarles todo lo que requiere una familia para sostenerse. 
Ruth María tiene algo más de 13 años  de ser cliente asidua de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización que le ha fortalecido su capital de trabajo y de la mano de ella  ha logrado cambios positivos, con el tiempo ha crecido porque puede ofrecerle mayores opciones de ropa a sus clientes; su mayor desafío es la innovación constante para sostener a su clientela, quienes   la prefieren porque siempre presenta   estilos están modernos  y  adaptados a los gustos y percepciones de cada uno. En la actualidad solicita su credickiva, para   comprar materias primas y elaborar vestidos elegantes preparándose para la temporada de fin de año, porque siempre esta atenta a hacer de cada fin de año, un derroche de elegancia en estas fiestas familiares
texts.en:
Ruth María B. P. lives in the San Roque neighborhood in the city of Barranquilla.  She is 71 years old, and she has two children, ages 30 and 33.  What she likes to do most in life is sewing.  That is why she created a business making clothing.  

For over 25 years the business has helped her respond to the need of getting her family ahead.  After the separation from her husband, this was her biggest concern.  At that time she had no suitable economic resources.  

Gradually, she started making clothes.  Her customers brought her the fabric, supplies, and the trimmings because she made customized clothing.  Little by little her business became stronger, and she was able to sell ready made clothes.  However, she always keeps in mind the size of each one of her customers.  That is how her business became the means to educate her children and to support them with everything a family needs.

Ruth María has been a regular client of the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for over 13 years.  This organization has strengthened her working capital, and through it she has managed to make positive changes.  In time, the business has grown, and she is able to offer her customers a greater variety of clothing.  Her biggest challenge is the constant innovation in order to maintain her customers.  

Her customers prefer her because she always has modern styles, which are adapted to what each one her customers like and their preferences.   

She is currently requesting a loan from Kiva to buy materials.  She will make elegant clothing in preparation for the end of the year season. At the end of every year she always tries to provide an abundance of elegance for these family celebrations.

loans.use: To buy materials to make elegant clothing in preparation for the end of the year season

loans.name: Maria Helen

texts.es: La señora  María  estado civil casada tiene cuatro hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar ella y su familia vive en la casa de los  padres de la Sra. María  que esta ubicado en el  Barrio el Carmen  Busch entre  tercer anillo externo. La Sra. María se dedica la venta de cosméticos hace  seis años nos comenta que su gran deseo es de tener una tienda grande  para vender sus productos .El crédito que se le otorgo a la clienta  es para la compra de sus productos de cosméticos al contado. La Sra. María manifestó que esta muy agradecida con nuestra institución por la confianza brindada en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
María is married and has four school age children.  She and her family live her in parents’ house, which is located in the Carmen Busch neighborhood amid Tercer Anillo Externo.

María has been selling cosmetics for six years. She tells us that her big wish is to have a large store in which to sell her products.

The loan is to buy her cosmetic products for cash.  María is very grateful to our institution and for the trust show in granting the loan.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics in bulk

loans.name: Princesitas Del Amor Group

texts.es:
“Princesitas del Amor” es el nombre que las señoras eligieron para su grupo, es parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, uno de los centros focales más antiguos en Pro Mujer El Alto. Este es su primer ciclo, las nueve integrantes son mujeres. 

La presidenta es la señora Nora Beatriz, ella  trabaja desde hace diez años en la confección de chamarras, su solicitud  ha sido por Bs.1000.- y piensa invertir este dinero en tela y otros, para la confección de chamarras.   Las chamarras  son elaboradas por ella misma, con la ayuda de la familia, son vendidas a sus clientes que se apersonan a su domicilio.

Con respecto a los negocios dentro de la asociación, son variados, entre ellos tenemos: venta de pan, venta de chamarra, minibús, venta de accesorios de automóviles, costura de deportivos y chamarras, venta de comida, tienda surtida, confección de chamarra, venta de lubricantes para autos.
texts.en:
“Princesitas del Amor” is the name chosen by these women for their group, which is part of the Los Andes focal center, one of the oldest focal centers of Pro Mujer El Alto. This is their first loan cycle, and the nine members are all women.

The president is Nora Beatriz; she has been making jackets for 10 years. Her loan request was for Bs.1,000, which she plans to invest in fabric and other supplies for making jackets. She makes the jackets and, with the help of her family, sells them to customers who come to her home. 

The business activities of the other members are varied, including: bread sales, jacket tailoring and sales, public transportation driver, sale of automobile accessories and automotive lubricants, tailoring athletic clothing and jackets, food sales, and a general store.

loans.use: Purchase of fabric and thread for making jackets

loans.name: Francisco Teodoro

texts.es: Don Francisco es de 61 años de edad, casado,  es comerciante, actualmente se dedica a  la elaboración, producción y venta de canastos plásticos, tiene más de 19 años de experiencia. He tenido ganancias gracias a este trabajo que realiza y de esta forma a logrado sostener a su familia, solicita su cuarto crédito a ASDIR, para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de canastos, es una persona responsable y trabajadora según los créditos que ha tenido con anterioridad.
texts.en:
Francisco Teodoro  Z. C.

Francisco is 61 years old and married.  He is a merchant that makes and sells plastic baskets.  He has more than 19 years of experience in his craft.  He is requesting his fourth loan for the purchase of materials he needs to make his baskets.  He has demonstrated that he is a responsible and hard-working person with his previous loans and will do the same with this loan.

loans.use: To purchase materials to make baskets

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El Sr Mario se dedica a la confección de ropa Deportiva (Poleras, Shorts y Gorras ) Solo trabaja con pedidos con pequeñas empresas tiene cuenta con dos operarios (ayudantes) a  los q le cancelan por prenda elaborada , El Sr Mario es separado hace 6 años y se quedo a cargo de sus 2 hijas una de 16 y la otra de 10 años el corre con todos los gastos de la casa y además es padre y madre para ellas la casa donde viven esta siendo financiada pero ya cancelo mas del 50% de su valor comercial, El dinero que solicito a Emprender es para el chapería y arreglo de su vehículo que es un apoyo para su trabajo ya que es el medio de transporte para la entrega de sus pedidos.
texts.en:
Mario makes sportswear (t-shirts, shorts, and hats).  He only works with orders from small companies.  He has two helpers who he pays per garment that they make.

Mario has been separated for six years.  His two daughters are under his care.  One is 16, and the other is ten.  He takes care of all of the household expenses.  He is also both mother and father to his daughters.  The house where they live is financed, but he has already paid for more than 50% of its commercial value.

The money that he is requesting from Emprender is for bodywork and repairs to his vehicle.  He uses his vehicle to deliver his orders; therefore the vehicle helps with his work.

loans.use: Bodywork and repair of his vehicle

loans.name: Candelaria Amelia

texts.es: Candelaria Amelia M. G. de 42 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijas de 13  16 años de edad, las cuales se dedican a estudiar, junto a ellas reside en el departamento de Chalatenango. Candelaria es una madre de familia muy responsable y trabajadora, que ha pesar que desempeña tanto el rol de madre como el de padre, ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia. Ella posee una tienda de productos comestibles como pan y golosinas, y también   de primera necesidad como: jabón y shampoo, y también comercializa verduras en su casa de habitación. Candelaria solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir aún más la tienda, así mismo para comprar mayor cantidad de maíz, y verduras los cuales son productos muy importantes en su negocio debido a que son de los que poseen mayor demanda, de manera que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes y de esta misma forma mejorar sus ventas lo cual es su prioridad para sacar adelante su hogar.
texts.en:
Candelaria Amelia M. G., age 42, is a single mother.  She has two daughters, ages 13 and 16.  Her daughters go to school.  They live in the Chalatenango department.  Candelaria is a very responsible and hard-working mother.  In spite of the fact that she fills the role of both mother and father, she has managed to get her family ahead.

She has a store where she sells edible products like bread and sweets.  She also sells basic needs items like soap and shampoo.  Additionally, she sells vegetables at her house.

Candelaria is requesting a loan to be able to stock her store even more.  She will buy a larger quantity of corn and vegetables.  These products are very important in her business because they are in the greatest demand.  This way she will be able to better serve her customers and improve her sales.  This is her priority in order to get her household ahead.

loans.use: Buy basic needs products

loans.name: Alba Sucelly

texts.es:
Alba Zucelly M.  S.
Alba  es de 38 años de edad, soltera, se dedica a la prestación de servicios profesionales como oficial de secretaria  en la municipalidad de Totonicapán, en la actividad tiene 17 años de experiencia, solicita su tercer  crédito para la compra de libros de educación, es factible autorizar a la solicitante, en virtud que la misma es utilizada mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Según referencia de la solicitante es una persona responsable, Por lo que no tendrá dificultades para efectuar los pagos correspondientes.
texts.en: Alba Zucelly M. S. is 38 years old, single, and provides professional services as an office worker in the municipality of Totonicapan.  She has 17 years of experience in this work, and is requesting her third loan to purchase educational books.  The applicant’s request should be authorized, for she has used her loans to improve her life.  According to a reference, the applicant is a responsible person, and will have no problems making payments as expected.

loans.use: Compra de libros educativos

loans.name: José Rigoberto

texts.es: José Rigoberto S. D. de 47 años de edad, reside en Ahuachapan, lugar en el cual vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja cuidando niños y junto a tres hijos, quienes se dedican a estudiar. El señor José trabaja realizando viajes en su pick up, día con día llega a la zona del mercado municipal de Chalatenango, en donde espera a que sus clientes lo soliciten para hacer algún viaje, José realiza su servicio para que las personas puedan trasportar sus ventas, así mismo para transportar objetos pesados o simplemente para llevar a alguna persona a sus destinos. El trabajo que José realiza es muy bueno ya que a diario trasporta a varias personas. Él solicita un préstamo ya que espera realizarle todas las reparaciones necesaria a su pick up, así de esta manera él se asegura brindar un mejor servicio en el cual sus clientes se sientan seguros.
texts.en: Jose Rigoberto S. D. is 47 years old, and lives in Ahuachapan, with his wife, who is a childcare provider, and with his three children, who are in school.  Jose provides transportation in his pickup, and each day comes to the Ahuachapan city market, where he waits for customers to hire him for trips.  Jose’s service is used by people to transport their sold items, and to transport heavy objects, or simply to take someone to a given destination.  Jose’s work is very good, and each day he carries several people.  He is requesting a loan to perform repairs needed by his pickup.  This will allow him to reliably provide better service, where his customers will feel safe.

loans.use: Mantenimiento de vehiculo.

loans.name: Gonzalo Abel

texts.es: El Sr. Gonzalo se dedica a la venta de Computadoras y accesoR. de computación, además dicta clases de computación en un Instituto de nuestra ciudad, esta casado, pero su negocio es totalmente independiente, el quiere ser uno de los mejores proveedores de accesoR. de computación tiene la intención de ampliar su negocio y a futuro lograr abrir una cadena de tiendas a nivel nacional, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de computadoras portátiles ya que un institución le hizo una cantidad de pedidos, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Gonzalo sells computers and computer accessories. In addition, he teaches computer training classes	in an institution in our city. He is married, but his business is completely independent. He wants to be one of the best providers of computer accessories. He intends to increase his business and in the future open a chain of stores at a national level. He will use the money from the loan to purchase laptop computers, since an institution has already given him a quantity of orders.

He is very grateful to the lending institution for the support they offer.

loans.use: Buy laptop computers

loans.name: Ovi

texts.es: Ovi, de 29 años, convive con Ángel, de 33 años, ambos tienen 3 hijos menores a los que quieren y cuidan con  mucho amor en una casa alquilada ubicada en la localidad de Patay. Como cada mañana se levanta temprano para preparar el desayuno de hijos que van a la escuela, y el resto del día lo dedica a cuidar su terreno de cultivo; desde muy niña le enseñaron a cultivar y trabajar la tierra, “la agricultura es parte de mi”, afirma.  Hace ya 6 años que adquirió su propio terreno de cultivo y ahora tiene mayor capital para poder invertirlo en la compra de más semillas y así obtener mayores ganancias. Ella se dedica a la siembra de arveja, papa y gladiolos, dentro de dos meses cosechará  dos hectáreas de arvejas y ya tiene compradores en el mercado central de su localidad; la calidad de sus verduras le brinda mayor demanda y mayores ganancias. Dentro de unos años podrá adquirir un terreno y así construirá su casa propia. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP y resalta la capacidad de ahorro de su banco comunal, en el que se siente feliz y realizada. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará abono para enriquecer los cultivos de arveja que ya muy pronto cosechará.
texts.en:
